venyson bake xix pety pernaunt zx quyncis wardowns past zxj lamprotms bake xxij lamprays bake xziij page pajre tart de chare zxiiij rastons axv darioles xxvj pyej de pare xxvij potrous xxviij flampoyntys bake xxix sewtrappe herbelade zzxj bake mete xxxij bake mete ryalle xxiiij crustaflebyal xzxiiij crustade xxxy crustade gentyle xxxvj doucettys xxxrij doucettys forcyd xxxviij daryole xxxix daryole xl flathons lente xlj leaf cookery book harleian ms pot age dyvers fifteenth century cookery book ab potage dyvers lange wortys de chare beeff merybonys boyle yt fayre water jan fayre wortys wassche hem clene water parboyle hem clene water jan hem tp je water je fyrst boylyng cnt je lenys jre caste hem je beff boyle gederys jan lof whyte brede grate yt caste je pot safron salt boyle serue lange wortes de pesonn grene pesyn washe hem clene caste hem potte boyle hem tyl jey breste janne hem vppe je potte pnt hem brothe yn nojer potte lete hem kele jan draw hem jorw straynowre fayre potte jan oynonys screde hem jre hole wortys boyle hem fayre water hem vppe ley hem fayre bord cytte iij iiij ley hem je oynonys je potte je drawyd pesyn hem boyle tyl jey ben tendyr janne tak fayre oyle frye hem ellys sum fresche broje sum maner fresche fybshe caste jer safron salt quantyte serne ujj jouteft borage yyolet malwys percely yong wortys bete alienee longebeff wyth orage ojer pyke hem clene caste hem vessel boyle hem goode whyle jan hem presse hem fayre bord hew hem ryght smal put whyte brede jer grynd wyth al jan caste hem fayre potte gode freshe brothe jer jorw straynowr caste jer ij aij marybonys ellys fayre fresche brothe beff hem sethe gederys whyle ueaf cookery book ha rle ms potage dyvers jan caste jer safron hem sethe gederys whyle fan caste jer safron salt seme dysshe bakon boylyd nojer dysshe men seruyth furmenty wyth venyson mj caboges fayre caboges cutte hem pike hem clene clene washe hem parboyle hem fayre water janne presse hem fayre bord jan choppe hem caste hem faire pot goode freysshe broth wyth mery bonys boyle jaime grate fayre brede caste jer caste jer safron salt ellys gode grwel mad freys flesshe draw jorw straynowr caste jer whan jou seruyst yt inne knocke owt je marw je bonys ley je marwe ij gobettys iij dysshe je semyth serue whyte wortes je erbys lyke jon dede pirates sethe hem water tyl jey ben neyshe janne hem vp bryse hem fayre bord drye jow jan choppe hem smale caste hem potte ley hem flowre rye mylke almanndys cast jer hony nowt moche nowt swete safron salt serue ynne ryjth good potage yj beef stywyd fayre beef je rybbys je fore quarterys smyte fayre pecys wasche je beef fayre potte jan je water jat je beef sojin yn strayne jorw straynowr sethe je water beef potte hem boyle gederys jan canel clowes maces graynys parise quibibes oynons mynced pwceli sawge caste jer hem boyle gederys jan lof brede stepe brothe venegre jan draw jorw straynoure stylle whan nere caste je lycour jer nowt moche jan boyle onys cast safroun jer quantyte jan salt venegre cast jer loke jat poynaunt rue vij gruelle forsydde otemele grynd smal sethe wyl porke jer ynne pulle je swerde pyke owt je bonys jan hewe grynd smal morter jan neme jin grwel jer jan strayne jorw straynour put potte sethe lytel salt euene colour wyth safroun serue rennyng viij venyson furmenty whete pyke clene morter caste lytel water jer stampe wtta pestel tyl back leaf ti yj sward rind skin thine equally cookery book harleian ms potaoe dyvers bole jan fan owt holyv put potte sethe tyl breke fan set yt douuw sone set ouer fyre stere wyl whan jjow bast sotbyn wyl put er inne swete mylke sej fere stere wyl whan coloure wyth safron salt euene dresse venyson nother dyshe wtta fayre hot water ix trype de motonn powncbe cbepe make clene caste pot boylyng water skyme clene gader grace al lat boyle tyl tender jmn ley fayre bord kyt smale pecys peny brede caste erj en pot strong brothe bef moton anne lenys percely hew hem hem boyle gederys tyl ey byn tender powder gyngere verious jan safroun salt caste jer boyle gederys seme wardonys syryp wardonys caste potte boyle hem till ey ben tender jan hem vp pare hem kytte hem pecys powder canel good qnantyte caste red wyne draw jorw straynour caste sngre er put erjen pot boyle jeanne caste je perys jer boyle gederys whan jey haue boyle whyle pouder gynger caste jer lytil venegre lytil safron loke poynaunt dowcet jrj froyde almoundys blake sugre cold water hem fayre potte hem boyle gedere salt skeme clene kele jan almaundys blawnche hem clene stampe hem draw hem wit je sugre water thikke fayre vessel yf je mylke nojt swete whyte sugre caste jer xij fride creme almaundys almaundys stampe hem draw vp wyth fyne thykke mylke temperyd wyth clene water throw hem sette hem je fyre boyle onys jan tak hem caste salt jer hem reste orlongwey caste lytyl sugre jer fan caste fayre lynen clothe fayre wasche drye caste al brode je clothe fayre ladel je clothe ben holdyn brode late je water vnder nethe je clothe janne gadere alio je kreme je clothe hongy pyn je water droppe owt iij owrys jan je pyn put bolle tre caste whyte ugre jer lytil salt jif hull lose tbe husks hulls husks ms thty added pieces bk ms forlange cookery book harleian ms potagb dyvbr wexe jrikke swete wyn put jw jrat nojt sene whan dressid maner mortrewys red anys comfyte leuys borage sette hem dysshe serne xiij creme boylede creme mylke brede paynemayn ellys tendyr brede breke creme elles mylke set fe fyre tyl warme hot rw straynonr jrowe put fayre potte sette fyre stere euermore whan boylyd fayre plkys eyron draw hem jorw straynowr caste hem jer hem stonde ouer fyre tyl boyle till skylf ully jikke jan caste ladel ful lasse boter er good quantite whyte sugre litel salt jmn dresse dysshe maner mortrewys xiiij ftnystis sonne pece beef mutoun wyne fayre water caste potte late hem boyle skeme wyl clene jan quystw stoppe hem wyth wyth hole pepyr marwe jan caste hem je potte ceuere wyl je potte hem stere ryjth wyl gederys jan powder gyngere lytel yerious salt caste jer janne seme hem fayre dysshe quyste dysshe je maner potage whan jowe shalt serue hem lytil je broth put dysshe wyth quystys seme xv bowres pypis hertys nerys myltys bybbys swyne ellys mawlard gees chop hem smal thanne parboyle hem fayre water jan tp pyke clene fayre potte caste jer ale sawge salt boyle ryjth wel anne serue orthe goode potage drawe hem clene washe hem fayre schoppe je leggys frye hem panne freybshe grece ryjt wyl jan ley hem fayre lynen clothe lette je grece renne owt jan oynonys mynce hem smale frye hem fayre freysshe grece caste hem erjen potte jan gode porcyon canel wyne draw jorw straynoure caste je potte wtta je oynonys jan caste je bryddys jer clowys maces lytil quantyte powder pepir er lete hem boyle gederys boue serue lxxxiiij vyaund de ciprys ryalle je del jolkys eyron je jridde dele hony clowes kutte hem roysonys tak brawn capoun hewe smal caste al potte lat boyle stere wyl wyne boyle hem make syryppe je potte al bowte jer hangyth late boyle wyl tille chargeaunt jin jombe pylt jer cleuey boyle jif nowt sette owt clen bolle wete jin bolle je syrippe caste jin mete jer whan jow dressist ji mete leche caste jin syryppe bouyn vppe serue blamanger pick stick written parts thumb put thy cookery book harleian ms potagb dyvebs izzxt ylede almaunde mylke flowre bys sugre hony powder gyngere galyngale en ngys kerue hern roysonys hole hard wastel dicyd coloure saunderys sethe dresse hem yn lxxrvj rys porcyoun rys pyke hem clene sethe hem welle late hem kele en gode mylke almaundys er se stere hem wyl er sugre hony serue orth lxxxvij manmenye ryalle vernage er strong wyne beste man fynde putte potte caste er gode quantyte ponder canelle sette fyre jif hete jeanne wrynge soft otw straynoure draf nowt owte put fayre potte pyke fayre newe pynys wasshe hem clene wyn caste gode quantyte jrer whyte sugre er moche lycoure caste er draw sawnderys wyth strong wyne orwe stray noure caste jer put alle potte caste er clowys gode quantyte sette fyre jif boyle en almaundya draw hem mythty wyne firste boyle ly vppe ale jif boyle sette fyre caste er tesyd brawn defaute pertriche capoun gode quantyte tryid gyngere phrase sesyn vppe pouder gyngere salt safroun jif stondyng ly wtta vernage swete wyne dresse flat backe sawcere vernage myjthty wyne loke fat jn haue sugre nowe serue hote lxxxviij mammenye bastarde potelle clarinyd hony pounde pynys pounde roysouns coraunce pound saunderys pouder canelle ij galouns wyne ale pound pepir caste alle potte skym yt iij pounde amyndons galon wyne gode galon venegre stepe vp gederys draw orw straynoure whan potte boylith caste lycoure er lat alle stondyng pouder gyngere salt safron sesyn vppe serue alle flat dysshe ah hote caste pouder gyngere jer serue orth ixxxix elys gauncelye elys fle hem sethe hem water caste lytil salt er brede skaldyd grynd temper wt ta brothe ale pepir gyngere safroune grynd alle ere jan neme oynonys percely boyle bk punstoned diced cat small squares meaning cookery book harleian ms potage dyvers possenet wel jen caste alle gederys sethe fere aerue ortli hcxxx hennys gauncelye hennys roste hem mylke garleke grynd panne hewe jin hennys jer jolkys eyron colonre safroun mylke seme lxxxxj vyolette kym almaunde mylke flowre rys ponder gyngere galyngale pepir datis fygys basonys corven colonre safroun boyle make chargeannt whan ra dressyste je flowres hew hem styre jer ta nyme je braunchys je flowres sette bone serue lxxxxq oystrys brnette schene oystrys kepe je water jat cometh hem strayne put potte ale jer lytil brede jer put gyngere canel ponder pepir jer safroun salt whan al moste putte jin oystrys loke jat jey ben wyl wasshe je schullys jan serue lxxxxiij walkys brnette walkys sethe ale jen pyke hem clene jan wasshem water salt hem fyrst wyth ale salt whele jey ben slepyr jen putte hem vynegre ley perceli boue serue ynne lxzzziiq tenche brnette je tenche sethe hem roste hem grynde pepir safroun bred ale tempere wyth je brothe boyle jen je tenche rostyd ley hym chargeoure jan ley je sewe bone lxxxxv tenche cyueye tenche skalde hym roste hym grynde pepir safroun brede ale melle gederys oynonys hakke hem frye hem oyle hem jer messe hem lxxzxyj tenche sawce tenche whan sothe ley dysshe percely oynonys mynce hem gederys pouder pepir canelle straw jer vynegre caste safroun jer coloure rue janne alle colde lxxxxvij chykonys brnette sethe chykonys smyte hem gobettys jan pepir gyngere brede grounde temper yppe wyth je brothe ale coloure safroun sethe serue lxxxxviij blamang fyshe bys sethe hem tylle brekyn late hem kele jan caste jer mylke almaundys nym foisehelt account whelks slippery slimy bk cookery book harleian ms potage dyybbs perche lopstere er melle fan nym sugre pouder gyngere caste er make chargeaunt fan serue xxxxix sardeynej almaundys make gode myike flowre bys safroun gyngere canelle maces quybibe grynd hem smal morter temper hem vppe mylke fan fayre vesselle fayre parte sugre boyle hem wyl rynsche fin dysshe alle bowte wtta ynne sugre oyle fan berne boseye almaunde mylke flowre bys sugre safroun boyle hem fere fan red bosys grynd fayre morter almaunde mylke fan loches toyle hem flowre frye hem ley hem dysshys fan gode pouder sewe caste sewe bouyn lochys serue cj eyron en poehe eyroun broke hem sethe hem hot water fan hem yppe hole fou fan flowre melle mylke caste er sugre hony lytel pouder gyngere boyle alle fere coloure safrotm ley fin eyroun dysshys caste fe sewe boue caste pouder blawnche pouder ys cij huskelys bruette muskelys whan fey ben sothe pyke owt muskele schulle pyke ye fan brede pepir safroun grounde temper vp wtta brothe jif ou wolt lye wyne wtta ale serue orth ciy fygeye fygys sethe hem tylle fey ben neysshe fa bray hem tylle fey ben smal enne hem vppe putte hem potte ale er fan bred gratyd pynej hole caste er boyle wyl atte dressoure caste pouder canel serue jif ow wolt colour yt iij maners myjt wtta saunderys safroun hym ley pouder berue orth cii bolas fayre bolasse wasshe hem clene wyne boyle hem fat fey skaldyd bywese boyle hem alle pomppe draw hem forw straynoure lye hem ta flowre bys make chargeawnt fyre boyl er whyte sugre gyngere clowys maces canelle stere wyl gederys anne gode perys sethe hem wel stalke sette hem kele pare hem clene pyke owt corys fan datis wasshe hem clene pyke owt stonys fylle hem ulle blaunche poudere fan leaf bub coyer pulp bk cookery book harleian ms potage dyvers stalke je perys je bolas ley iij lechys dysshe sette jin perys jer yn cv lorey de boolas bolas seje hem lytil draw hem jorw straynoure caste hem broje jer brede gratyd boyle fere jolkys eyroun swengyd lyid canel galyngale skemyd hony jer sethe wyl serue cyj bapeye fleysshe lene porke sode grounde smalle tempere vppe je broje potte caste er lytil honye boyle tyl chargeaunt lye wyth jolkys eyroun coloure saunderys dresse pouder marchaunt cvij sore sengle elys gurnard parte hem half wyne half watere potte percely oynonys hewe hem smalle clowes maces caste er safroun caste jer sette je fyre boyle tylle jen sette doun poudere gyngere canelle galyngale temper vppe wyne cast je potte serue prymerose ojer half pound plowre rys iij pound almaundys half vnce hony safroun flowre je pryme rose grynd hem temper hem vppe wtta mylke je almaundys pouder gyngere boyle plante jin skluce bosys serue orth cix gelye de chare caluys fete skalde hem fayre water make hem alle je whyte howhys vele ley hem water soke je blode fen hem vppe lay hem fayre lynen cloje lat water rennyn hem jan skore potte putte je fete je howhys jer jan whyte wyne jat wolle hold coloure cast jer porcyon ojer lycoure jat je eleysshe ouer wewyd alle sette je fyre boyle skeme clene whan tendyr boylid vppe je eleyshe fayre bolle saue je lycoure wyl loke jat jow haue fayre sydys pyggys fayre smal chykenys wyl clene skladdyd drawe lat je leggys je fete waysshe hem fayre water caste hem je yrste brothe sethe jen ouer je fyre skeme clene lat man eu rmore kepe blow je grauy cas je lycoure wast caste je wyne jer put jin honde jer jif jin hond waxe clammy syne godenesse viscous compound leaf scour cookery west waste cookery book harleian ms potage dyyrrs je pleyshe moche sothe bere kyttyng jan vppe ley fayre cloje sette owt je lycoure fro fyre put colys vnder nethe je vesselle fat lyeonre yn fan ponder pepir gode qnantyte safron fat haue fayre laumbere coloure gode quantyte vynegre loke fat sau ry salt vynegre fayre coloure safronn putte fayre lynen clofe sette vnder nethe fayre pewter dysshe lat renne orw clofe ofte tylle renne clew kytte fayre rybbys syde pygge lay ham dysshe pulle lemys chykenys eche fro er skynne ley sum dysshe fayre chowchyd pore jin gelye jer lay almaundys jer clowys paryd gyngere cx gelye de fysshe newe pykys draw hem smyte hem pecys sethe je lycoure jat jou doste gelye fleysshe whan ey ben perchys tenchys seje elys kutte hem fayre pecys waysshe hem putte hem je lycoure loke jine lycoure styf jif wolle notte cacche soundys watteryd stokkefysshe ellys skynnys plays caste jer sethe ouer fyre skeme wyl ys nowt eysshe breke jenne je lycoure fro je fyre ou dedyst jat ojer gelye saue pylle je pysshe ley jer dysshis perche suche flowre hem serue forthe ftg tannye almaunde mylke sugre powdere gyngere galyhgale canelle rede wyne boyle fere fat gode tannye cxij sturmye gode gnmey whyte pesyn hoole hem je maner men don caboges blaunche perry jan sethe hem wtta almaunde mylke vppe putte jer sugre fryid oynonys oyle berne orth cxlix potage sethe fewe eyrori red wyne jan draw hem jorw straynoure wtta gode mylke almaundys jen caste jer roysonys coraunce dates taylid grete roysonys pynes ponder pepir sawndrys clouys maces hony lytil doucete salt jan bynde hym vppe flat lytyl flowre rys hem ben red saunderys serue hym flatte jif jou wolt fleyssh tyme caste vele choppid smale ci cawdel lento make gode mylke almaundys draw vppe wyne red whyte beterw jif schal whyte jan strayne jolkys eyroun fewe put sugre salt sugre jen begynnyth boyle sette flatte rue euer kepe whyte jou je dressoure droppe alkenade jer serue jou wylt haue hym chargeaunt bynd hym vppe slour rys ojer whetyn floure fors jif jou wolt coloure hym wtta safrown straw pouder sugre serue orth cy creme bastarde je whyte eyroun grete hepe putte panne ul mylke yt boyle jen sesyn salt hony lytel jen lat jrow je mylke boue jat commelyche serae cliy pompys beef porke yele hem raw alle choppe atte je dressoure jan grynd hem morter smal jgu jan caste raw jolkys eyroun wyn lytil whyte sugre caste jer ponder pepyr macys clowes quybibys pouder canelle synamoun salt lytil safroun jen make smale pelettys round loke jat jou haue fayre potte preysshe broje bef capoun euer jrow hem jer lete hem sethe tyl jat jey ben jen draw vppe jryfty mylke almaundys wtta cold freysshe broje bef vele motori ojer capotm lye floure rys spycerye atte je dressoure ley jes pelettys yj dysshe jen pore jin sewe aneward rue ellys make gode jryfty syryppe ley jin pelettys atte je dressoure jat gode saruyse leche vyaundez brawn comfyte preysscfc brawn sethe yt pare grynde mortere temper almand mylke draw jorw straynoure potte caste jer sugre powder clowys boyle jen floure canelle pouder gyngere jen je potte putte lynen cloje presse lat boyle longe je potte tylle alle jikke jan vppe presse cloje jen leche fayre ta knyff jinne jaw jif jou wolt jou myjht je rybbys je bore al bare chete hem enlongys jorw je lechys serue leche euery dysshe jj blannche brawen preysshe braun mynce hew smal gode jikke mylke almaundys blaunchyde putte alle potte sugre lat boyle alle gederys tyl ryjt styffe jen caste vppe caste fayre cold basyn lette stonde tyl cold jen leche ij iij dysshe serue iy pynade hony gode pouder gyngere galyngale canelle pouder pepir graynys parys boyle ere jan kyrnelys pynotys caste jer chyconys soje hew hem grece thine blank pages follow bk ms dray set douce ms cookery book harleian ms leche vyaundez caste er lat seje fere jen lat droppe jer knyf jif eleuyth wexyth hard ys jen putte chargere tyl cold mace lechys serue ojer metys jif jou wolt make spycery jen putte chykonys jer ii gyngerbrede quart bony eethe skeme clene safroun pouder pepir jrow er gratyd brede make ehargeaunt jat wol lechyd jen pouder canelle straw jer jen make yt square lyke jou wolt lecbe yt jou lecbyst byt caste box leves bouyn stykyd jer clowys jif jou wolt baue bed coloure saunderys lecbe lumbarde datys je stonys setbe swete wyne bem vppe grynd bem mortere draw vppe jorw straynoure wtta lytyl wbyte wyne sugre caste hem potte lete boyle tylle styff jen yt vppe ley borde jan pouder gyngere canelle wryng molde gederys jin bondys make styf jat wolle lecbyd jif nojt styf nowe hard jolkys eyron kreme jer ellys grated brede make jicke jen clareye caste jer maner syryppe jou shalt rue vj auter maner lecbe lumbarde fayre hony clarifi yt je fyre tylle wexe bard jen bard olkys eyroun kryme gode quantyte jer tyl styf jenne vppe ley borde jen fayre gratyd brede pouder pepir molde gederys jine bondys tylle styf jat wole ben lecbyd jan lecbe jen wyne pouder gyngere canelle lytil claryfyid hony late renne jorw straynour caste jis syryp jer jou shalt rue instede clerye vy soupes salomere boylid porke hew yt grynd jen cowe mylke eyroun swonge safrouw mynce percely bladys caste jer boyle alle fere dresse vppe cloje kerne jer smal lechys hem dyssbe jen almaunde mylke flowre kys sugre safroun boyle alle fere jen caste jin sewe jin lechys serue alle hote viij lette lardes kowe mylke jer eyroun swonge jan ryjt fatte porke sotbe hew smalle sethe pouder gyngere galyngale pepir caste jer colour wytb safroun caste make stiff crimme crumble thine bk cookery book harleian ms leche vyatjndez jese gederys boyle gadre je croddes hepe wtu al jen vppe je croddys hepe ale presse hem cloje jan kerne jer lechys roste gredyre strawe sngre alle bowte jif jou wolt make jat syde rede jat ojer jelow pannes make haue sayd colonre jat panne saunderys jat saffroune ley cloje gederys je rede fyrste je cloje lat je jelow abouyn je rede presse hem gederys syde wol ben rede jat ojer jelow jow wolt hane motley jre potty make letlardys eche colonre jat saunderys jat ojer wyth safroune je jrydde nother degre jat jey ben dyuerse jey boyle caste al gederys stere hem bowte jin hond jan presse hem wol motley whan ys lechyd ix mange moleynne aim aundys anblaunche hem draw jorw straynoure jicke mylke potte jan brawn capoun hew smalle potte lye floure rys jer whyte grece sethe alle gederys sothe vppe je fyre jer sugre jen blannchyd almaundys frye hem ley iij lechys dysshe enery leche prycke iij almaundys jan serue vyaund de leche whyte wyne god quantite putte potte jen putte jer raw jolkys eyroun tryid ponder clowys pouder canel safroun jan lat boyle tyl ryjth chargeawnte jen sette doun sette oner panne cowe milke jrow saunderys nowe jer jen make styf poshote ale jen je croddys lat honge pyn cloje lat cleue euer jerue owt jen je cawdel forsayd melle hem gederys cloje wita je poshotte jen put jer sugr canel pouder gyngere presse hem vp sware leche serue vyaund leche cowe mylke set oner je fyre jrow jer saunderys make styf poshotte ale jan hang je croddys jer pynne fayre cloje lat ouer renne jan put hony jer melle fere jen feche je croddys je deye melle hem gederys lay chesefatte torne tenche steue hym potte wyne pyke owt je bonys stampe hem morter jen lytil jicke almaunde mylke putte jen hem vppe pntte hem je broje forsayde jat soje jat straynid caste jer maces clowes pouder pepir jan je whyte eyroun jrow make hem hard jat jey mow ben hosted spete make hem round appil make fyre wt ta owte smoke jen almaunde mylke bontyd flow hem gederys sugro putte jin batura jen dore hem sum grene jing parcely jolkys eyroun geder jat jey ben grene wyl war jat jey ben nowt browne sum men boyle hem freysshe broj jey ben spetid whan jey ben boylid jen jey ben sette kelid jan spete hem dore hem olkys eyroun mengyd ius haselle leuys xx yrchouns figgis mawys skalde hem wel grouwdyn porke knede spicerye pouder gyngera salt sugre je mawe lle nowt fnlle jen sewe hem fayre jrede putte hem jan make jin baturys je grene jat ojer jelow je grene percely xxiiij waflres je wombe luce seje hew wyl morter tender chese jer grynde hem fere jan flowre whyte eyroun bete gedere jen sugre pouder gyngere al gederys loke jat jin eyroun ben hote ley jer jin paste jan make jitt waffrys serue yn xxv hagws schepe je roppis je talowr parboyle hem jan hakke hem smal grynd pepir safroun brede jolkys roysonys grynde hem mortere draw vppe kreme almaundys jan rys jorw cloje jan je luce je perche je schrympe seje hem je bonys je hedys grynde hem mortere draw hym vppe je creme je almaundys jen rys hem potte ouer je fyre whan jey ben clene lytil watere late hem seje til jey ben drye jat jey schorge jan hew borde jer jen sugre safroun goode quantyte gode pouder caste er boyle fere frye oyle make jer froyse berue orth xliij payn pur dew fayre jolkys eyroua trye hem fro je whyte draw hem jorw straynoure salt caste jer jan fayre brede kytte troundej rounde jan fayre boter jat claryfiyd ellys fayre freysshe grece putte potte make hote jan wete wyl jin troundej je jolkys putte hem je panne frye hem vppe ware cleuyng panne whan fryid ley hem dysshe ley sugre nowe jer janne serue forht xliiij meselade eyroun je jolkys je whyte gedere draw hem jorw straynoure jan litil botere caste fayre frying panne whan je boter hot je drawyn eyroun caste jer jan sawcere gadre je eyroun gedere je panne je brede pewter dysshe jan fayre pecej brede je mountance mosselle brede vppe je eyroun turne jan thy brede downward je panne janne je panne caste fayre whyte mausade douce ms added bk cookery book harleian ms leche vyaundez sugre jer serue euery good meslade jowsand eyroun mo xlv brawune frye brawune kytte jinne jan je jolkys eyroun sum je whyte jer wt ta jan mengyd flowre draw je eyroun jorw straynoure jen gode quantyte sugre saferoun salt caste fayre panne freyssche gres set ouer je fyre whan je grece hote je brawn putte bature turne wyl jer yn jan putte je panne je grece late frye gederys lytil whyle jan vppe fayre dyssche caste sugr jer jan serue xlvj longe fretoure milke make fayre croddes je maner chese al tendyr jan owt je whey clene jou putte bolle jan jolkys eyroun ale menge floure cast jer gode quantyte draw jorw straynoure fayre vesselle jan panne fayre grece hete je fyre lat nowt boyle jan ley jin creme brode jan knyif kytte quantyte jer fro je borde je panne efte nojer frye whan brownne vppe fayre dyssche caste sugre jer serue xlvij eapeye dow make jer jinnekake janne fygys raysonys smal grounde temper hem almaunde milke ponder pepir galyngale clowes menge gederys ley jin kake long bene koddys ouer caste jin kake gederys dewte je eggys frye oyle serue xlviij eyschewysin lente fygys sethe hem uppe ale jan whan jey ben tendyr bray hem smal morten jan almaundys schrede hem smal perys schrede hem datyb schrede hem nym milwel lenge jat wel wateryd tese jer jan make jin farsure rolle long jin hond ley hem flowre jan make jin bature ale floure frye hem vppe brown oyle ryjt make round lyke fretourys je maner sayd frye hem vppe jat ben clepid kagons janne serue hem xlix hanoney draw je whyte je jolkys je eyroun jorw straynoure jan oynonys schrede frye gederys litel whyle jan hem vp serue alle broke gederys fayre dyssche hagas de almaynne fayre eyroun je jolke je whyte draw hem jorw straynow jan fayre percely parboyle potte boyling broje jan je jolkys eyroun hard sothe hew je jolkys je percely smal gederys fan sugre pouder gyngere salt caste jer jen merow putte straynourys ende lat hange boyling potte parboyle vppe kele jan kytte smal pecys jan je drawyn eyroun put hem panne al brode vnneje ony grece je panne eowche ye jolkys je percely jer je panne jan eowche je marow pecys jer jan fold vppe eche kake neje eche corner iiij square platte turne je panne onej lye litel whyle jan vp serue orth cryspej whyte eyroun mylke floure lytel berme bete gederys draw jorw straynoure jot renneng styf caste sugre salt janne chafer ful freysshe grece boyling put jin hond je bature lat jin bature renne dowun jin fyngerys je chaf ere whan ronne gedere je chafere nym skymer vp lat al je grece renne owt put fayre dyssche cast jer sugra serue ly jenne owt je erbys wtta skymoure fro je broje caste hem je porke je bolle jan mynce datys smal caste hem boysonys coraunce pyne drawe jorw straynoure jolkys eyroun jw sugre ponder gyngere salt coloure lytel wtta safroune toyle yt wtta jin hond al jes gederys jan make fayre round cofyns harde hem lytel je ovyn jan hem owt wyth dyssche jin hond fylle hem ulle je stuffe jan sette hem jer jen lat hem bake serue xxxij bake mete make fayre lytel cofyns jan perys nf jey ben lytelle put iij cofynne pare clene twyn euery pere ley gobet marow yf jou haue lytel perys grete gobet ham put hem je ovyn whyle jan jin commade lyke jou eolf harl yp colde leaf back added adds salt fleysshe hit panne leaf cookery book harleian ms vyaunde furnez takybt dowcetys pore lat je marow je pecyj ben sene whan serue orth xxxiij bake mete ryalle make litel cofyns chykonys soje oj porke soje smale hackyd oj hem boje glowys maces quybibes hakke wtta alle melle yt cromyd marow lay sugre jan ley je cofynne je myddel lay gobet marow sugre round bowte lat bake jis soperys xxxiijj crustade ryal pyke owt je marow bonys hool jou jen je bonys seje hem watere je broje fat jen almaundys wayssche hem clene bray hem temper hem vppe je fat broje jan wyl je mylke broun jen ponder ganelle gyngere sugre caste jer jan make fayre cofyns lat hem hard je ovyn jan roysonys coraunce ley je cofynne taylid datys kyt long jen eyroun ewe straynid swenge mong je milke je jolke jen botmon je cofynne jer je marow schal stonde steke er gret long gobettys jar vppe ryjt lat bake whyle jen pore jin comade jer half ul lat bake whan yt nygfc ynowe put hit faire possenet caste pwcely oynons mynced reysons corauns powder pep canel clowes saundres saff erofi aftid salt caste thereto wyfi lituti vynegre sette yd je potte lete hit boile sokingly faire charcole til hit ynogfr en lay fflessfi disshes siripp thera vppon serve stwed mutton faire mutton hath ben roste elles capons suche er flessli mynce faire put hit possenet elles bitwefi ij siluer disshes caste thereto faire parcely oynons smati mynced caste wyfi lituti vynegre vergeous ponder pepar canel salt saffron lete stue faire coles efi rue hit forthe wyfie ne vynegre ale mustard quantite vergeous stede vyne vinegre capons stwed parcelly sauge isopp rose mary tyme breke hit bitwefi thi hondes stopp capon wit colour hym fol cookery book ii harl venison fritters safferofi couche erthefi potte brasse ley splentes vnderneth aboujt sides capon touche things potte strawe good herbes potte put pottel wyfi thou gete licowr hele potte close led stoppe hit aboujt dogh bater eier oute set hit faire charcole lete seeth easly longe till hit ynowe hit erthefi potte jen set hit fire whafi ou takest hit downe lete hit touche grounde breking whafi hete ouer past oute capon prik thefi make siripp wyne reysons corance sugur safferofi andboile hit lituh medel pouder ginger litul wyfi ewto thefi awey fatte sewe capofi sirypp sewe powr hit capon berne flathonys mylke yolkes egges ale drawe hem thorgh straynowr white sugur blak melt faire butter put thereto salt make faire coffyns put hem nowne til jei lituh hard efi pile dissh fastned ofi fih coffyns therewith seid stuffs late hem bake en hem oute sirue hem forthe caste sugur ynogh hem venysofi ybake hanches venysofi parboile faire water salt efi faire paast ley ofi venysofi cutte pieces jwu wolt cast vnder hit aboue hit powder ginger pep salt medyld togidre sette hem oven lete hem bake til ey ynogh frutowrs yolkes oi egges drawe hem thorgh streynowr caste faire floure berme ale stere togidre til hit thik pared appelles cut hem hyfi obleies ley hem batur efi put hem ffrying pafi fry hem faire grece buttur til ei befi browne yelowe thefi put hem disshes strawe sugur ofi hem ynogh serue hem forthe longe frutowrs mylke make faire croddes thew maner chese al tendur oute clene thefi put hit faire boh yolkes egges white menge flours caste thereto good quantite drawe hit jorgh streynour faire vessel thefi put hit faire pafi fry hit litull faire grece lete boyle thefi oute ley ofi faire borde kutte faire smale peces cover fol oven sacramental wafers fol cookery book ii haul custards meat tarts thou list putte hem ayefl panne til thei browne theii caste sugur oil hem seme hem pety pimantes faire floure sugur saflrofi salt make paast er theii make small coflyns cast eche coffyii iij iiij rawe diddest je er custarde yele smyte hit lituti peces wassh clene put hit faire potte faire water lete hit boyle togidre en porcelly sauge isopp sauerey wassh hem hewe hem cast hem flessh whan hit raw almaundys grynde hem temper hem vp gode ale lytil water draw jjorw strayn oure fayre potte late boyle whyle caste er safroun sugre salt serue al hotte maner potage lij gyngaudre lyuerys codlyngys haddok elys hake hed freysshe mylweli hedys pouches lyuerys sethe hem fayre water hem vp fayre bord mynce smal pouches gode freysshe brothe samoun turbut elys cast mynced pouches er ponder pepyr boyle brothe pouches lyuerys wer sodoun iu stipe fayre brede draw oyw straynoure mynce lyuer fayre pecys whan pouches haue boylid licoure caste leuer er boyle whyle caste er lyuerys wyne venegre safroun salt late boyle whyle serue iat rennyng liij rapeye half eygys halfe eoysonys boyle hem wyne ian bray hem morter draw wyth lycoure jiorw straynoure jikke stondynge jeanne roysons corauns pynys clowys kaste jjer eyroun whyte jolke draw orw stray noure whan lycoure ys boyling caste er eyroun ale styre tylle crodde presse lytil platere serue sane caste er broj beeff capoun ivij charlet forcyd ryally gode mylke almaunde tender porke hew smal bray morter eyroun di aw orw cloj temper vppe flesshe jjer caste potte mylke sette ouer fyre sesyn wyth salt safroun caste er boyle yt komyth lye yvith wyne sette fyre roste seme ortli xl puddyng paysse blode hym grece liym ote mele salt pepir gyngere melle ese gederys wel putte gutte purpays lat sej csyli hard good whylys hyni vppe broyle hym lytil sertie orth xli raynouej yrn sode porke chese sej fere caste er gode ponder pepir canelle gyngere clowes mac close comade dow frye freysshe grece ryjt wel jeanne serue xlij froyse lentynne fygis eoysonys grynde hem mortere draw vppe kreme almaundys rys jjorw clo luce jie perche schrympe sejie hem bonys jie hedys grynde hem mortere draw hym vppe ta creme almaundys en rys hem potte ouer fyre whan ey ben clene lytil watere late hem sej til ej ben drye ej schorge fan hew horde er en sugre safrouw goode quantyte gode pouder caste jj boyle fere frye oyle make er froyse serue orth xliij payn pur dew fayre jolkys eyrouw trye hem fro whyte draw hem orw straynoure salt caste er fayre brede kytte troundej rounde jan fayre boter claryfiyd ellys fayre freysshe grece putte potte make bote wete wyl troundej jolkys putte hem panne frye hem vppe ware cleuyng panne whan fryid ley hem dysshe ley sugre nowe er jeanne serue forht xliiij meselade eyroun plkys whyte gedere draw hem orw straynoure aii litil botere caste fayre frying panne whan jje boter hot drawyn eyroun caste er sawcere gadre ep oun gedere panne brede pewter dysshe jjan fayre pecej brede mountance mosselle brede vppe eyroun turne thy brede downward je panne jeanne panne caste fayre whyte mausadt douce ms added bk cookery book hakleian ms leche vyaundez sugre er serue eueiy good meslade powsand eyroiin mo xlv brawune fryej brawune kytte jiiune jolkys ep oun sum pe whyte arl mengyd flowre draw eyroun orw straynoure yen gode quantyte sugre saferoun salt caste er fayre panne freyssche gres set ouer fyre wlian grece bote brawn putte bature turne wyl cr yn putte panne grece late frye gederys lytil wliyle vppe fap dyssche caste sugre er serue xlvj longe fretoure milke make fayre croddes er oi maner chesc al tendyr owt whey clene ou putte bolle jolkys eyroun ale nienge floure cast er gode quantyte draw jjorw straynoure fayre vesselle panne fayre grece hete fyre lat nowt boyle jian ley creme brode knyff kytte quantyte er fro horde panne efte noj er frye whan brownne vppe fayre dyssche caste sugre er serue xlvij rapeye dow make er ymne kake jeanne fygys raysonys smal groimde temper hem almaunde milke pouder pcpir galyngale clowes raenge gederys ley jjin kake long bene koddys ouer caste kake gederys dewte eggys frye oyle serue xlviij ryschewys lente fygys sethe hem uppe ale whan cy ben tendyr bray hem pore er lat marow pecyj ben sene whan serue orth xxxiij bake mete ryalle make litel cofyns chykonys ojier porke smale hackyd er hem boj clowys maces quybibes hakke ta alle melle yt cromyd marow lay sugre ley cofynne myddel lay gobet marow sugre round bowte lat bake sopeiys xxxiiij crustade ryal pyke owt marow bonys hool ou fen bonys se pe hem watere broj fat jien almaundys wayssche hem clene bray hem temper hem vppe fat broj wyl mylke broun en pouder canelle gyngere sugre caste er make fayre cofyns lat hem hard ovyn roysonys coraunce ley cofynne taylid datys kyt long eii eyroun fewe straynid swenge mong milke jolke en botmon cofynne er marow schal stonde steke er gret long gobettys jier vppe ryjt lat bake whyle en pore comade er halful lat bake whan yt rysith en serue xxxv crustade cofyn bake hym drye en marw bonys er enne nym hard plkys eyroun grynde hem smal lye hem vppe milke nym raw jolkys eyro melle hem mong chikonys smete jier inne yf ou luste smal birdys force wyl jiin comade sugre hony clowys macej pepir safron put fier salt yt bake serue xxxvj crustade gentyle cofyn bake grynd porke vele smal harde jolkys eyroun lye almaunde milke make hem stondyng marow bonys ley cofynne fylle hem fulle comade serue orth xxxvij doucettes porke hakke smal eyroun mellyd gederys lytel milke melle hem gederys hony pepir bake hem cofyn serue xxxviij doucettes forcyd almaunde milke jolkys eyroun melled gederys safroun salt hony dry jjin cofyn ley fin mari bonys fer caste fin comade er serue orth xxxix daryoles milke eyroun fatte freyssche perys til jg back adds eibbes ffresh beef thou wilt roste hit hil hit nygfi ynowe put hit faire possenet caste er rcely oynons mynced reysons corauns powder peper canel clowes saundres safferon salt caste wyii lituh vynegre sette yd potte lete hit boile sokingly faire charcole til hit ynogh eil lay essii disshes sirippe vppoil serve stwed mutton faire mutton hath beii roste elles capons suche er flessfi mynce faire put hit possenet elles bitwen ij siluer disshes caste thereto faire rcely oynons smah mynced caste wyn lituh vynegre vergeous pouder peper canel salt saffron lete stue faire coles eh serue hit forthe wyne ne vynegre ale mustard quantite vergeous pe stede vyne vinegre capons stwed rcelly sauge isoppe eose mary tyme breke hit bitwen thi hondes stoppe capon colowr hym fol cookery book ii harl venison potte faire water lete hit boyle togidre pflrcelly sauge isoppe sauerey wassh hem hewe hem cast hem flessb whan hit boileth powder peper canel glowes maces saffron salt lete hem boyle togidre goode dele wyne ah whan flesshl boyled vppe fro broth lete broth kele whan hit colde streyne yolkes white egges thorgh streynomr put hem broth broth styff ynowe make faire cofyns couche iij iiij peces yolkes white egges breke hem thereto streyne hem ah orgh strayno tih hit thik woh faire mary dates cutte ij iij prunes put hem faire coffyns paast put coffyn oven lete hem bake tih thei hard drawe hem syrypp lituh saundres caste boylyng loke hit stonde gynger sugur aley hit ta canell cast salt thereto lete boyle theii caste oute treyii vesseh lete kele theii pare clene rasinges ginger temper ij iij dales wyne ley hem clarefied hony colde ah day night en rasons oute hony caste hem peres composte theii seme hit sirippe ah colde nought bote chare de wardone peer wardens seth hem wine water theii hem vppi grinde hem morter drawe hem thorgh streynoure licowr put hem potte sug ellej clarefiede hony caneh ynowe lete hem boile theii hit irom fire lete kele caste rawe yolkes eyreii til hit thik ladeli thou dressest hit saucer vincgr mighty wyne wete saucer ladeli fore cleving loke hit haue sugur ynogh serve hit longe wortes de peson grene pesyfi wassh hem clene cast hem potte boyle hem til breke hem vppe fro fire putte hem broth vesseh lete hem kele drawe hem thorgh streynowr faire potte theii oynones ij iij peces hole wortes boyle hem fayre water hem vppe ley hem oil faire horde kutte hem iij iiij peces caste hem oynons potte di aweii peseii late hem boile togidre til ah tendur theii faire oile fray ellej ressh broth manor fissh jiou maist oyle quantite caste thereto saffroii salt quantite lete hem boyle wel togidre til befi ynogh stere hem weh euermore serue hem forthe elys sorre eles fie hem choppe hem faire colpons wassh hem clene putte hem faire potte theii rcelly oynons shrede togidre eles pouder peper broth fissh set hit ouer fire lete hem boyle togidre en lofe brede alay brede broth drawe hit thorgh streynoi whaii eles beil almoost sodde ynowe caste lete hem boile flampoyntys bake xxix sewtrappe herbelade zzxj bake mete xxxij bake mete ryalle xxiiij crustaflebyal xzxiiij crustade xxxy crustade gentyle xxxvj doucettys xxxrij doucettys forcyd xxxviij daryole xxxix daryole xl flathons lente xlj leaf cookery book harleian ms pot age dyvers fifteenth century cookery book ab potage dyvers lange wortys de chare beeff merybonys boyle yt fayre water jan fayre wortys wassche hem clene water parboyle hem clene water jan hem tp je water je fyrst boylyng cnt je lenys jre caste hem je beff boyle gederys jan lof whyte brede grate yt caste je pot safron salt boyle serue lange wortes de pesonn grene pesyn washe hem clene caste hem potte boyle hem tyl jey breste janne hem vppe je potte pnt hem brothe yn nojer potte lete hem kele jan draw hem jorw straynowre fayre potte jan oynonys screde hem jre hole wortys boyle hem fayre water hem vppe ley hem fayre bord cytte iij iiij ley hem je oynonys je potte je drawyd pesyn hem boyle tyl jey ben tendyr janne tak fayre oyle frye hem ellys sum fresche broje sum maner fresche fybshe caste jer safron salt quantyte serne ujj jouteft borage yyolet malwys percely yong wortys bete alienee longebeff wyth orage ojer pyke hem clene caste hem vessel boyle hem goode whyle jan hem presse hem fayre bord hew hem ryght smal put whyte brede jer grynd wyth al jan caste hem fayre potte gode freshe brothe jer jorw straynowr caste jer ij aij marybonys ellys fayre fresche brothe beff hem sethe gederys whyle ueaf cookery book ha rle ms potage dyvers jan caste jer safron hem sethe gederys whyle fan caste jer safron salt seme dysshe bakon boylyd nojer dysshe men seruyth furmenty wyth venyson mj caboges fayre caboges cutte hem pike hem clene clene washe hem parboyle hem fayre water janne presse hem fayre bord jan choppe hem caste hem faire pot goode freysshe broth wyth mery bonys boyle jaime grate fayre brede caste jer caste jer safron salt ellys gode grwel mad freys flesshe draw jorw straynowr caste jer whan jou seruyst yt inne knocke owt je marw je bonys ley je marwe ij gobettys iij dysshe je semyth serue whyte wortes je erbys lyke jon dede pirates sethe hem water tyl jey ben neyshe janne hem vp bryse hem fayre bord drye jow jan choppe hem smale caste hem potte ley hem flowre rye mylke almanndys cast jer hony nowt moche nowt swete safron salt serue ynne ryjth good potage yj beef stywyd fayre beef je rybbys je fore quarterys smyte fayre pecys wasche je beef fayre potte jan je water jat je beef sojin yn strayne jorw straynowr sethe je water beef potte hem boyle gederys jan canel clowes maces graynys parise quibibes oynons mynced pwceli sawge caste jer hem boyle gederys jan lof brede stepe brothe venegre jan draw jorw straynoure stylle whan nere caste je lycour jer nowt moche jan boyle onys cast safroun jer quantyte jan salt venegre cast jer loke jat poynaunt rue vij gruelle forsydde otemele grynd smal sethe wyl porke jer ynne pulle je swerde pyke owt je bonys jan hewe grynd smal morter jan neme jin grwel jer jan strayne jorw straynour put potte sethe lytel salt euene colour wyth safroun serue rennyng viij venyson furmenty whete pyke clene morter caste lytel water jer stampe wtta pestel tyl back leaf ti yj sward rind skin thine equally cookery book harleian ms potaoe dyvers bole jan fan owt holyv put potte sethe tyl breke fan set yt douuw sone set ouer fyre stere wyl whan jjow bast sotbyn wyl put er inne swete mylke sej fere stere wyl whan coloure wyth safron salt euene dresse venyson nother dyshe wtta fayre hot water ix trype de motonn powncbe cbepe make clene caste pot boylyng water skyme clene gader grace al lat boyle tyl tender jmn ley fayre bord kyt smale pecys peny brede caste erj en pot strong brothe bef moton anne lenys percely hew hem hem boyle gederys tyl ey byn tender powder gyngere verious jan safroun salt caste jer boyle gederys seme wardonys syryp wardonys caste potte boyle hem till ey ben tender jan hem vp pare hem kytte hem pecys powder canel good qnantyte caste red wyne draw jorw straynour caste sngre er put erjen pot boyle jeanne caste je perys jer boyle gederys whan jey haue boyle whyle pouder gynger caste jer lytil venegre lytil safron loke poynaunt dowcet jrj froyde almoundys blake sugre cold water hem fayre potte hem boyle gedere salt skeme clene kele jan almaundys blawnche hem clene stampe hem draw hem wit je sugre water thikke fayre vessel yf quybibes pouder canelle lete party ben whyte rat er jelow er grene percely ley euery leche dysshe loke mylke temperyd wyth wyne er bede wyn lxzix apple muse appelys sethe hem serge hem orwe sefe potte anne almaunde mylke hony caste er amydon bk strip ms jaw sift cookery book harle ms potage dyvers gratid brede safroun saunderys salt lytil caste je potte lete hem sethe loke jat jou stere wyl seme lxzx salomene gode wyne gode pouder brede ground sugre boyle fere jan trowtys rochys perchys ojer carpys ojer alle jese fere make hem clene aftere roste hem grydelle hewe hem gobettys whan jey ben sothe fry hem oyle lytil jen caste je brwet whan jou dressist maces clowes quybibes gelofrys cast boue serue lxxxj blaundysorye almaunde mylke flowre rys brawn capounys hennys pouder gyngere boyle fere make chargeaunt whan jou dressest yn nym maces quybibes caste boue sertce orth mxxxij blamang rys lese hem clene wasshe hem clene flake water jan sethe hem watere aftyrward almaunde mylke jer brawn je capoun aftyrward nojer almaunde mylke te smal sumdele pyn euer wolt caste jer stere wel nym sugre caste jer jen make chargeaunt jen blawn chyd almaundys frye hem sette hem boue whan ra seruyst ynne jif jou wolt jou myjte departe hem cawdelle ferry wreten xlvij cxxxix jan serue lxxxiij vyaund de cyprys bastarde gode wyne sugre aftyrward caste gedere jenne whyte gyngere galyngale canel fayre mynced jen iuse percile flowre rys brawn capoun chykonnys grounde caste jer coloure wyth safroun saunderys ly jolkys eyroun make chargeaunt whan jou dressest yn maces clowes quybibes straw boue serue lxxxiiij vyaund de ciprys ryalle je del jolkys eyron je jridde dele hony clowes kutte hem roysonys tak brawn capoun hewe smal caste al potte lat boyle stere wyl wyne boyle hem make syryppe je potte al bowte jer hangyth late boyle wyl tille chargeaunt jin jombe pylt jer cleuey boyle jif nowt sette owt clen bolle wete jin bolle je syrippe caste jin mete jer whan jow dressist ji mete leche caste jin syryppe bouyn vppe serue blamanger pick stick written parts thumb put thy cookery book harleian ms potagb dyvebs izzxt ylede almaunde mylke flowre bys sugre hony powder gyngere galyngale en ngys kerue hern roysonys hole hard wastel dicyd coloure saunderys sethe dresse hem yn lxxrvj rys porcyoun rys pyke hem clene sethe hem welle late hem kele en gode mylke almaundys er se stere hem wyl er sugre hony serue orth lxxxvij manmenye ryalle vernage er strong wyne beste man fynde putte potte caste er gode quantyte ponder canelle sette fyre jif hete jeanne wrynge soft otw straynoure draf nowt owte put fayre potte pyke fayre newe pynys wasshe hem clene wyn caste gode quantyte jrer whyte sugre er moche lycoure caste er draw sawnderys wyth strong wyne orwe stray noure caste jer put alle potte caste er clowys gode quantyte sette fyre jif boyle en almaundya draw hem mythty wyne firste boyle ly vppe ale jif boyle sette fyre caste er tesyd brawn defaute pertriche capoun gode quantyte tryid gyngere phrase sesyn vppe pouder gyngere salt safroun jif stondyng ly wtta vernage swete wyne dresse flat backe sawcere vernage myjthty wyne loke fat jn haue sugre nowe serue hote lxxxviij mammenye bastarde potelle clarinyd hony pounde pynys pounde roysouns coraunce pound saunderys pouder canelle ij galouns wyne ale pound pepir caste alle potte skym yt iij pounde amyndons galon wyne gode galon venegre stepe vp gederys draw orw straynoure whan potte boylith caste lycoure er lat alle stondyng pouder gyngere salt safron sesyn vppe serue alle flat dysshe ah hote caste pouder gyngere jer serue orth ixxxix elys gauncelye elys fle hem sethe hem water caste lytil salt er brede skaldyd grynd temper wt ta brothe ale pepir gyngere safroune grynd alle ere jan neme oynonys percely boyle bk punstoned diced cat small squares meaning cookery book harleian ms potage dyvers possenet wel jen caste alle gederys sethe fere aerue ortli hcxxx hennys gauncelye hennys roste hem mylke garleke grynd panne hewe jin hennys jer jolkys eyron colonre safroun mylke seme lxxxxj vyolette kym almaunde mylke flowre rys ponder gyngere galyngale pepir datis fygys basonys corven colonre safroun boyle make chargeannt whan ra dressyste je flowres hew hem styre jer ta nyme je braunchys je flowres sette bone serue lxxxxq oystrys brnette schene oystrys kepe je water jat cometh hem strayne put potte ale jer lytil brede jer put gyngere canel ponder pepir jer safroun salt whan al moste putte jin oystrys loke jat jey ben wyl wasshe je schullys jan serue lxxxxiij walkys brnette walkys sethe ale jen pyke hem clene jan wasshem water salt hem fyrst wyth ale salt whele jey ben slepyr jen putte hem vynegre ley perceli boue serue ynne lxzzziiq tenche brnette je tenche sethe hem roste hem grynde pepir safroun bred ale tempere wyth je brothe boyle jen je tenche rostyd ley hym chargeoure jan ley je sewe bone lxxxxv tenche cyueye tenche skalde hym roste hym grynde pepir safroun brede ale melle gederys oynonys hakke hem frye hem oyle hem jer messe hem lxxzxyj tenche sawce tenche whan sothe ley dysshe percely oynonys mynce hem gederys pouder pepir canelle straw jer vynegre caste safroun jer coloure rue janne alle colde lxxxxvij chykonys brnette sethe chykonys smyte hem gobettys jan pepir gyngere brede grounde temper yppe wyth je brothe ale coloure safroun sethe serue lxxxxviij blamang fyshe bys sethe hem tylle brekyn late hem kele jan caste jer mylke almaundys nym foisehelt account whelks slippery slimy bk cookery book harleian ms potage dyybbs perche lopstere er melle fan nym sugre pouder gyngere caste er make chargeaunt fan serue xxxxix sardeynej almaundys make gode myike flowre bys safroun gyngere canelle maces quybibe grynd hem smal morter temper hem vppe mylke fan fayre vesselle fayre parte sugre boyle hem wyl rynsche fin dysshe alle bowte wtta ynne sugre oyle fan berne boseye almaunde mylke flowre bys sugre safroun boyle hem fere fan red bosys grynd fayre morter almaunde mylke fan loches toyle hem flowre frye hem ley hem dysshys fan gode pouder sewe caste sewe bouyn lochys serue cj eyron en poehe eyroun broke hem sethe hem hot water fan hem yppe hole fou fan flowre melle mylke caste er sugre hony lytel pouder gyngere boyle alle fere coloure safrotm ley fin eyroun dysshys caste fe sewe boue caste pouder blawnche pouder ys cij huskelys bruette muskelys whan fey ben sothe pyke owt muskele schulle pyke ye fan brede pepir safroun grounde temper vp wtta brothe jif ou wolt lye wyne wtta ale serue orth ciy fygeye fygys sethe hem tylle fey ben neysshe fa bray hem tylle fey ben smal enne hem vppe putte hem potte ale er fan bred gratyd pynej hole caste er boyle wyl atte dressoure caste pouder canel serue jif ow wolt colour yt iij maners myjt wtta saunderys safroun hym ley pouder berue orth cii bolas fayre bolasse wasshe hem clene wyne boyle hem fat fey skaldyd bywese boyle hem alle pomppe draw hem forw straynoure lye hem ta flowre bys make chargeawnt fyre boyl er whyte sugre gyngere clowys maces canelle stere wyl gederys anne gode perys sethe hem wel stalke sette hem kele pare hem clene pyke owt corys fan datis wasshe hem clene pyke owt stonys fylle hem ulle blaunche poudere fan leaf bub coyer pulp bk cookery book harleian ms potage dyvers stalke je perys je bolas ley iij lechys dysshe sette jin perys jer yn cv lorey de boolas bolas seje hem lytil draw hem jorw straynoure caste hem broje jer brede gratyd boyle fere jolkys eyroun swengyd lyid canel galyngale skemyd hony jer sethe wyl serue cyj bapeye fleysshe lene porke sode grounde smalle tempere vppe je broje potte caste er lytil honye boyle tyl chargeaunt lye wyth jolkys eyroun coloure saunderys dresse pouder marchaunt cvij sore sengle elys gurnard parte hem half wyne half watere potte percely oynonys hewe hem smalle clowes maces caste er safroun caste jer sette je fyre boyle tylle jen sette doun poudere gyngere canelle galyngale temper vppe wyne cast je potte serue prymerose ojer half pound plowre rys iij pound almaundys half vnce hony safroun flowre je pryme rose grynd hem temper hem vppe wtta mylke je almaundys pouder gyngere boyle plante jin skluce bosys serue orth cix gelye de chare caluys fete skalde hem fayre water make hem alle je whyte howhys vele ley hem water soke je blode fen hem vppe lay hem fayre lynen cloje lat water rennyn hem jan skore potte putte je fete je howhys jer jan whyte wyne jat wolle hold coloure cast jer porcyon ojer lycoure jat je eleysshe ouer wewyd alle sette je fyre boyle skeme clene whan tendyr boylid vppe je eleyshe fayre bolle saue je lycoure wyl loke jat jow haue fayre sydys pyggys fayre smal chykenys wyl clene skladdyd drawe lat je leggys je fete waysshe hem fayre water caste hem je yrste brothe sethe jen ouer je fyre skeme clene lat man eu rmore kepe blow je grauy cas je lycoure wast caste je wyne jer put jin honde jer jif jin hond waxe clammy syne godenesse viscous compound leaf scour cookery west waste cookery book harleian ms potage dyyrrs je pleyshe moche sothe bere kyttyng jan vppe ley fayre cloje sette owt je lycoure fro fyre put colys vnder nethe je vesselle fat lyeonre yn fan ponder pepir gode qnantyte safron fat haue fayre laumbere coloure gode quantyte vynegre loke fat sau ry salt vynegre fayre coloure safronn putte fayre lynen clofe sette vnder nethe fayre pewter dysshe lat renne orw clofe ofte tylle renne clew kytte fayre rybbys syde pygge lay ham dysshe pulle lemys chykenys eche fro er skynne ley sum dysshe fayre chowchyd pore jin gelye jer lay almaundys jer clowys paryd gyngere cx gelye de fysshe newe pykys draw hem smyte hem pecys sethe je lycoure jat jou doste gelye fleysshe whan ey ben perchys tenchys seje elys kutte hem fayre pecys waysshe hem putte hem je lycoure loke jine lycoure styf jif wolle notte cacche soundys watteryd stokkefysshe ellys skynnys plays caste jer sethe ouer fyre skeme wyl ys nowt eysshe breke jenne je lycoure fro je fyre ou dedyst jat ojer gelye saue pylle je pysshe ley jer dysshis perche suche flowre hem serue forthe ftg tannye almaunde mylke sugre powdere gyngere galyhgale canelle rede wyne boyle fere fat gode tannye cxij sturmye gode mylke almaundys drawe wyne porke hew smalle morter grynde ryth smalle en caste mylke caste potte sawnderys flowre rys melle hem mylke draw hem jjorw strayhoure caste clene pot loke chargeaunt sugre smale oynonys mynce hem frye hem oyle caste jer fewe saunderys hem boyle lytil jen je lampronys skalde hem gap ms hot water sethe boyle hem dysshe cast je sewe vppe serue potage cxliiij schyconys je bmesse halfe dosyn ghykonys putte hem potte jen putte jer gode gobet freyssha beef lat hem boyle wyl putte jer percely sawge leuys sauerey smal hakkyd putte jer safroun jen kytte jin brewes skalde hem wit je broje salt wyl jou haue beef motoua fyrste stuffe jin chekons jis wyse seje hard eyrouw je jolkys choppe hem smal choppe jer clowys maces hole pepir stuffe jin chekonys wtta al put hole seruyd saue men sayn gode ley hem bagge ouernyjth rennyng streme water morwe sette vppe watere je water skaldyng hot jrow hem jeron hoole hem wyse forsayd serue cxlvy brwes lentyn water boyle draw iyer er brede cromys wyne lete alle ben wyne jen put jer hony gode quantyte jat ben dowcet jan putte ponder pepir clowys maces saunderys salt skalde jin brewes tender serue orth cxlviij whyte pesyn gnmey whyte pesyn hoole hem je maner men don caboges blaunche perry jan sethe hem wtta almaunde mylke vppe putte jer sugre fryid oynonys oyle berne orth cxlix potage sethe fewe eyrori red wyne jan draw hem jorw straynoure wtta gode mylke almaundys jen caste jer roysonys coraunce dates taylid grete roysonys pynes ponder pepir sawndrys clouys maces hony lytil doucete salt jan bynde hym vppe flat lytyl flowre rys hem ben red saunderys serue hym flatte jif jou wolt fleyssh tyme caste vele choppid smale ci cawdel lento make gode mylke almaundys draw vppe wyne red whyte beterw jif schal whyte jan strayne jolkys eyroun fewe put sugre salt sugre jen begynnyth boyle sette flatte rue euer kepe whyte jou je dressoure droppe alkenade jer serue jou wylt haue hym chargeaunt bynd hym vppe slour rys ojer whetyn floure fors jif jou wolt coloure hym wtta safrown straw pouder sugre serue orth cy creme bastarde je whyte eyroun grete hepe putte panne ul mylke yt boyle jen sesyn salt hony lytel jen lat hit kele draw jorw straynoure fayre cowe mylke draw yt wtta seson sugre loke jat poynant doucet serue potage gode bakyn mete wheder jat jou wolt clij capoun salome capoun skalde hym roste hym jen cabbages bk thine ms cookery book harleian ms leche vyaundez jikke almaunde mylke temper wyth wyne whyte red lytyl saunderys lytyl safroun make marbyl coloure bo atte je dressoure jrow hym ye kychoun jrow je mylke boue jat commelyche serae cliy pompys beef porke yele hem raw alle choppe atte je dressoure jan grynd hem morter smal jgu jan caste raw jolkys eyroun wyn lytil whyte sugre caste jer ponder pepyr macys clowes quybibys pouder canelle synamoun salt lytil safroun jen make smale pelettys round loke jat jou haue fayre potte preysshe broje bef capoun euer jrow hem jer lete hem sethe tyl jat jey ben jen draw vppe jryfty mylke almaundys wtta cold freysshe broje bef vele motori ojer capotm lye floure rys spycerye atte je dressoure ley jes pelettys yj dysshe jen pore jin sewe aneward rue ellys make gode jryfty syryppe ley jin pelettys atte je dressoure jat gode saruyse leche vyaundez brawn comfyte preysscfc brawn sethe yt pare grynde mortere temper almand mylke draw jorw straynoure potte caste jer sugre powder clowys boyle jen floure canelle pouder gyngere jen je potte putte lynen cloje presse lat boyle longe je potte tylle alle jikke jan vppe presse cloje jen leche fayre ta knyff jinne jaw jif jou wolt jou myjht je rybbys je bore al bare chete hem enlongys jorw je lechys serue leche euery dysshe jj blannche brawen preysshe braun mynce hew smal gode jikke mylke almaundys blaunchyde putte alle potte sugre lat boyle alle gederys tyl ryjt styffe jen caste vppe caste fayre cold basyn lette stonde tyl cold jen leche ij iij dysshe serue iy pynade hony gode pouder gyngere galyngale canelle pouder pepir graynys parys boyle ere jan kyrnelys pynotys caste jer chyconys soje hew hem grece thine blank pages follow bk ms dray set douce ms cookery book harleian ms leche vyaundez caste er lat seje fere jen lat droppe jer knyf jif eleuyth wexyth hard ys jen putte chargere tyl cold mace lechys serue ojer metys jif jou wolt make spycery jen putte chykonys jer ii gyngerbrede quart bony eethe skeme clene safroun pouder pepir jrow er gratyd brede make ehargeaunt jat wol lechyd jen pouder canelle straw jer jen make yt square lyke jou wolt lecbe yt jou lecbyst byt caste box leves bouyn stykyd jer clowys jif jou wolt baue bed coloure saunderys lecbe lumbarde datys je stonys setbe swete wyne bem vppe grynd bem mortere draw vppe jorw straynoure wtta lytyl wbyte wyne sugre caste hem potte lete boyle tylle styff jen yt vppe ley borde jan pouder gyngere canelle wryng molde gederys jin bondys make styf jat wolle lecbyd jif nojt styf nowe hard jolkys eyron kreme jer ellys grated brede make jicke jen clareye caste jer maner syryppe jou shalt rue vj auter maner lecbe lumbarde fayre hony clarifi yt je fyre tylle wexe bard jen bard olkys eyroun kryme gode quantyte jer tyl styf jenne vppe ley borde jen fayre gratyd brede pouder pepir molde gederys jine bondys tylle styf jat wole ben lecbyd jan lecbe jen wyne pouder gyngere canelle lytil claryfyid hony late renne jorw straynour caste jis syryp jer jou shalt rue instede clerye vy soupes salomere boylid porke hew yt grynd jen cowe mylke eyroun swonge safrouw mynce percely bladys caste jer boyle alle fere dresse vppe cloje kerne jer smal lechys hem dyssbe jen almaunde mylke flowre kys sugre safroun boyle alle fere jen caste jin sewe jin lechys serue alle hote viij lette lardes kowe mylke jer eyroun swonge jan ryjt fatte porke sotbe hew smalle sethe pouder gyngere galyngale pepir caste jer colour wytb safroun caste make stiff crimme crumble thine bk cookery book harleian ms leche vyatjndez jese gederys boyle gadre je croddes hepe wtu al jen vppe je croddys hepe ale presse hem cloje jan kerne jer lechys roste gredyre strawe sngre alle bowte jif jou wolt make jat syde rede jat ojer jelow pannes make haue sayd colonre jat panne saunderys jat saffroune ley cloje gederys je rede fyrste je cloje lat je jelow abouyn je rede presse hem gederys syde wol ben rede jat ojer jelow jow wolt hane motley jre potty make letlardys eche colonre jat saunderys jat ojer wyth safroune je jrydde nother degre jat jey ben dyuerse jey boyle caste al gederys stere hem bowte jin hond jan presse hem wol motley whan ys lechyd ix mange moleynne aim aundys anblaunche hem draw jorw straynoure jicke mylke potte jan brawn capoun hew smalle potte lye floure rys jer whyte grece sethe alle gederys sothe vppe je fyre jer sugre jen blannchyd almaundys frye hem ley iij lechys dysshe enery leche prycke iij almaundys jan serue vyaund de leche whyte wyne god quantite putte potte jen putte jer raw jolkys eyroun jan je whyte eyroun jrow make hem hard jat jey mow ben hosted spete make hem round appil make fyre wt ta owte smoke jen almaunde mylke bontyd flow hem gederys sugro putte jin batura jen dore hem sum grene jing parcely jolkys eyroun geder jat jey ben grene wyl war jat jey ben nowt browne sum men boyle hem freysshe broj jey ben spetid whan jey ben boylid jen jey ben sette kelid jan spete hem dore hem olkys eyroun mengyd ius haselle leuys xx yrchouns figgis mawys skalde hem wel grouwdyn porke knede spicerye pouder gyngera salt sugre je mawe lle nowt fnlle jen sewe hem fayre jrede putte hem jan make jin baturys je grene jat ojer jelow je grene percely xxiiij waflres je wombe luce seje hew wyl morter tender chese jer grynde hem fere jan flowre whyte eyroun bete gedere jen sugre pouder gyngere al gederys loke jat jin eyroun ben hote ley jer jin paste jan make jitt waffrys serue yn xxv hagws schepe je roppis je talowr parboyle hem jan hakke hem smal grynd pepir safroun brede jolkys eyroun raw kreme swete mylke al gederys je grete wombe je schepe jat mawe jan seje hym jaerue ynne xxyj frawnchemyle nym eyroun je whyte gratid brede chepis talow grete dyse nym pepir safroun grynd alle gederys je wombe je chepe jat je mawe seje hem wyl serue xxvij appraylere je fleysshe je lene porke seje wel whan soje hew smal nym jan safroun gyngere canel salt galyngale chese myid brede bray smal morter caste jin fleysshe je spicery loke jat wil ground temper vppe raw eyroun jan longe pecher al bowte oner alle jat ransched jan held jin grece fulle ji pechir jin farsure pese fayre canneuas rolle gederys putte hem round spete roste hem til jey ben jan lay hem dysshe pore jer vynegre lityl venous pouder pepir gyngere canelle fewe jolkys hard eyroun kremyd serue xxxj make stekys venson bef yeny son bef leche gredyl vp broun jen vynegra litel verious lytil wyne putte pouder perpir pouder gyngew atte je dressoure straw pouder canelle jat je stekys al helid wyth litel sawce jan serue xxxtj je leuer je herte parboyle fayre water jan choppe hem smal put raw jolkys eyroun ij iij choppe maces clowes put jer safroun lytil pouder pepir salt fille hym vppe sew hym lay long je capon bakke prycke hym jer roste hym serue orth xxxv capoun gos farced percely swynys grece sewet schepe parhoyle hem gederys til jey ben tendyr jan harde jolkys eyroun choppe caste pouder pepir gyngere canel safroun salt grapis tyme jere clowys nowe defawte grapis oynons fyrst wil boylid afterward alle choppyd stuffe hym roste hym serue hym jif je lust litil porke sode al choppe hit smal mong jat ojer wol clowys jer pouder gyngere canelle galyngale vynegre sugre salt jan janne serue xxxviij kyde forsyde pigge make hym clene skyline hym fylle ul suche mete jou dost capoun jan je fleysshe vntrusse hym spete je maner kede roste hym endore hym jolkys eyroun kede jan serue xxxix eyroun lentyn eyroun blow owt jat ys wtta ynne atte pjer ende jan waysshe je schulle clene warme water jan gode mylke roysonys grynde hem mortere draw vppe kreme almaundys jan rys jorw cloje jan je luce je perche je schrympe seje hem je bonys je hedys grynde hem mortere draw hym vppe je creme je almaundys jen rys hem pitte je salt al holow je schap treen dyssche sette je panne je salt oner je fyre jen tyl je salt brennyng hote jan caste jin whyte je jolkys eyroun je hole je salte lat seje ouer je fyre tyl half harde jan put dyssche half fulle salt jan dressoure knyf put vnderneje je salt je panne hef vppe fayre jat je cofyn je eyroun breke nojt jan sette je dyssche wyth je salt jan serue xxix flampoynto bake fayre butte porke seje hem fayre watere clene pyke je bonys je synewes hew hem grynd hem mortere temper je whyte eyrotm sugre pouder pepir gyngere salt jan neyssche cruddis grynd hem draw jorw straynonre caste jw aneys salt pouder gyngere sugre jan je stuffe je porke putte euelong cofyn fayre past fejer endore je stuffe je cofyn je cruddys whan bake pynej clowys plante je cofyn boue rew rew nojer jan serue orth melle mix ms je je cofyns fyre harl leaf heave lift cookery book harleian ms vyaunde furnez sewtrappe ij lytel erjen pannys sette je colys tyl jey ben hote make dyssche ulle jikke bature moure watere grece lytel jat ojer panne je bater jer lat renne al bowte je panne jat je pan al helyd sette je panne jen ouer je yre colys jat ojer panne boue jat ojer panne tyl baken whan bake jat wol ryse fro je eggys je panne kydes fleyssche jong porke hew percely ysope sauerey hew hit smal jrow mong je fleyssche panne cofynne je colys hele jat ojer panne colys bouyn lat baken wyl whan eyroun breke hem je pikes draw jorw straynoure caste je jolkys hwyte sugre gyngere canelle galyngale sture wyl gederys al sette je panne cast bonyn je cofynne je panne sture gederys hele ajenward jat ojer panne lay colys boue lat bake wyl tyl yt owt je panne hole moche jow wolt janne serue xxxj herbelade butt porke smyte hem pecys sette ouer je fyre seje hem fayre water whan soje ley fayre bord pyke owt alle je bonys hew smal put fayre bolle jan ysope sawge percely gode quantite hew smal putte fayre vesselle jan lytel je broje jat je porke jin draw jorw straynoure caste je erbys af boyle jenne owt je erbys wtta skymoure fro je broje caste hem je porke je bolle jan mynce datys smal caste hem boysonys coraunce pyne drawe jorw straynoure jolkys eyroun jw sugre ponder gyngere salt coloure lytel wtta safroune toyle yt wtta jin hond al jes gederys jan make fayre round cofyns harde hem lytel je ovyn jan hem owt wyth dyssche jin hond fylle hem ulle je stuffe jan sette hem jer jen lat hem bake serue xxxij bake mete make fayre lytel cofyns jan perys nf jey ben lytelle put iij cofynne pare clene twyn euery pere ley gobet marow yf jou haue lytel perys grete gobet ham put hem je ovyn whyle hem vppe je fat broje jan wyl je mylke broun jen ponder ganelle gyngere sugre caste jer jan make fayre cofyns lat hem hard je ovyn jan roysonys coraunce ley je cofynne taylid datys kyt long jen eyroun dissh blannche brawne fressh brawne myce smah almondes blaunche hem grynde hem thorgh streynowr stuffs mylke put al potte sugur boyle al togidr til hit stuff thqfi vp cast hit faire basyfi lete stonde lituti saff erofi serve hit forthe pigge chiken sange pigge draw smyte hede kutte quarters boyle til ynow vpp lete cole smyte peces hondefuti ij sange waesn hit grynde morter hard yolkes egges drawe hit vpp goode vinegre make hit thyfi sesofi hit powder peper ginger salt cowche thi pigge disshes caste siripp er vppofi seme forthe stwed beeff faire ribbes ffresr beef thou wilt roste hit hil hit nygfc ynowe put hit faire possenet caste pwcely oynons mynced reysons corauns powder pep canel clowes saundres saff erofi aftid salt caste thereto wyfi lituti vynegre sette yd je potte lete hit boile sokingly faire charcole til hit ynogfr en lay fflessfi disshes siripp thera vppon serve stwed mutton faire mutton hath ben roste elles capons suche er flessli mynce faire put hit possenet elles bitwefi ij siluer disshes caste thereto faire parcely oynons smati mynced caste wyfi lituti vynegre vergeous ponder pepar canel salt saffron lete stue faire coles efi rue hit forthe wyfie ne vynegre ale mustard quantite vergeous stede vyne vinegre capons stwed parcelly sauge isopp rose mary tyme breke hit bitwefi thi hondes stopp capon wit colour hym fol cookery book ii harl venison fritters safferofi couche erthefi potte brasse ley splentes vnderneth aboujt sides capon touche things potte strawe good herbes potte put pottel wyfi thou gete licowr hele potte close led stoppe hit aboujt dogh bater eier oute set hit faire charcole lete seeth easly longe till hit ynowe hit erthefi potte jen set hit fire whafi ou takest hit downe lete hit touche grounde breking whafi hete ouer past oute capon prik thefi make siripp wyne reysons corance sugur safferofi andboile hit lituh medel pouder ginger litul wyfi ewto thefi awey fatte sewe capofi sirypp sewe powr hit capon berne flathonys mylke yolkes egges ale drawe hem thorgh straynowr white sugur blak melt faire butter put thereto salt make faire coffyns put hem nowne til jei lituh hard efi pile dissh fastned ofi fih coffyns therewith seid stuffs late hem bake en hem oute sirue hem forthe caste sugur ynogh hem venysofi ybake hanches venysofi parboile faire water salt efi faire paast ley ofi venysofi cutte pieces jwu wolt cast vnder hit aboue hit powder ginger pep salt medyld togidre sette hem oven lete hem bake til ey ynogh frutowrs yolkes oi egges drawe hem thorgh streynowr caste faire floure berme ale stere togidre til hit thik pared appelles cut hem hyfi obleies ley hem batur efi put hem ffrying pafi fry hem faire grece buttur til ei befi browne yelowe thefi put hem disshes strawe sugur ofi hem ynogh serue hem forthe
