chare beeff merybonys boyle yt fayre ater fayre wortys wassche hem clene water parboyle hem clene water hem vp water fyi st boylyng cut leuys caste hem fe beff boyle gederys lof whyte brede grate yt caste pot safron salt boyle serue ij lange wortes de pesoun grene pesyn washe hem clene caste hem potte boyle hem tyl ej breste jeanne hem vppe potte put hem brothe yn er potte lete hem kele draw hem jjorw straynowre fayre potte oynonys screde hem hole wortys boyle hem fayre water hem vppe ley hem fayre bord cytte iij iiij ley hem oynonys potte drawyd pesyn hem boyle tyl ey ben tendyr jeanne tak fayre oyle frye hem ellys sum fresche bro sum manor fresche fysshe caste er safron salt quantyte serue iij joutes borage yyolet malwys percely tong wortys bete auence longebelf wyth orage oper pyke hem clene caste hem vessel boyle hem goode whyle jian hem presse hem fayre bord hew hem ryght smal put whyte brede jier grynd wyth al jjan caste hem fayre potte gode freshe brothe er orw straynowr caste er ij iij marybonys ellys fayre fresche brothe beff hem sethe gederys whyle leaf cookery book harleian ms potage dyvers caste er safron hem setlie gederys whyle caste er safron salt serue dysshe bakon boylyd er dysshe men seruyth furmenty tvyth venyson iiij caboges fayre caboges cutte hem pike hem clene clene washe hem parboyle hem fayre water jeanne presse hem fayre bord choppe hem caste hem faire pot goode freysshe broth wyth mery bonys boyle jeanne grate fayre brede caste jier caste er safron salt ellys gode grwel mad freys flesshe draw orw strayno caste er whan jjou seruyst yt inne knocke owt marw bonys ley marwe ij gobettys iij dysshe semyth serue whyte wortes erbys lyke ou dede jouutes sethe hem water tyl ey ben neyshe jianne hem vp bryse hem fayre bord drye ow choppe hem smale caste hem potte ley hem flowre rys mylke almaundys cast jier hony nowt moche nowt swete safron salt serue ynne ryjth good potage yj beef stywyd fayre beef rybbys fore quarterys smyte fayre pecys wasche beef fayre potte water beef sojiin yn strayne jiorw straynowr sethe fe water beef potte hem boyle gederys canel clowes maces graynys parise quibibes oynons mynced pwceli sawge caste er hem boyle gederys lof brede stepe yvith brothe venegre draw orw straynoure sty lie whan nere caste lycour er nowt moche ab boyle onys cast safroun er quantyte salt venegre cast er loke jiat poynaunt serue vij gruelle forsydde otemele grynd smal sethe wyl porke er ynne pulle swerde pyke owt bonys jjan hewe grynd smal morter neme grwel er jjan strayne orw straynour put potte sethe lytel salt euene colour wyth safrou serue rennyng viij venyson furmenty whete pyke cleue morter caste lytel water er stampe pestel tyl back leaf sward rind skin thiue equally cookery book harleian ms potage dyveus hole fan owt holys put potte sethe tyl breke fan set yt doun sone set ouer fyre stere wyl wlian hast sothyn wyl put er inne swete mylke sej fere stere wyl whan coloure wyth safron salt euene dresse venyson nother dyshe ta fayre hot water ix trype de motoun fe pownche chepe make clene caste pot boylyng water skyme clene gader grece al lat boyle tyl tender ley fayre bord kyt smale pecys peny brede caste erj en pot strong brothe bef moton jeanne leuys cely hew hem er hem boyle gederys tyl ey byn tender powder gyngere verious safroun salt caste cr boyle gederys serue wardonys syryp wardonys caste potte boyle hem till ey ben tender hem vp pare hem kytte hem pecys powder canel good quantyte caste red wyne draw orw straynour caste sugre er put erj en pot boyle jeanne caste perys er boyle gederys whan ej haue boyle whyle ponder gyngere caste fei lytil venegre lytil safron loke fat poynaunt dowcet xj froyde almoundys blake sugre cold water hem fayre potte hem boyle gedere salt skeme clene kele almaundys blawnche hem clene stsmpe hem draw hem fe sugre water thikke fayre vessel yf fe mylke nojt swete whyte sugre caste er xij fride creme almaundys almaundys sta pe hem draw vp wyth fyne thykke mylke temperyd wyth clene water throw hem sette hem fe fyre boyle onys fan tak hem caste salt er hem reste forlongwey caste lytyl sugre jier caste fayre lynen clothe fayre wasche drye caste al brode fe clothe fayre ladel clothe ben holdyn brode late water vnder nethe fe clothe panne gadere alle fe kreme fe clothe hongy pyn fe water droppe owt iij owrys pyn put bolle tre caste whyte sugre er lytil salt hull lose husks hulls husks ms added pieces bk forlatige cookery book harleian ms potage dyyers tvexe ikke swete wyn put jer pat nojt sene whan dressid maner mortrewys red anys comfyte leuys borage sette hem dysshe serue xiij creme boylede creme mylke brede paynemayn ellys tendyr brede breke creme ewes mylke set fyre tyl warme hot orw straynour rowe put fayre potte sette fyre stere euermore whan boylyd fayre jolkys eyron draw hem orw straynowr caste hem er hem stonde oner fyre tyl boyle till skylf ully jpikke caste ladel ful lasse boter er good quantite whyte sugre litel salt dresse dysshe maner mortrewys xiiij ftuystis scune pece beef mutou wyne fayre water caste potte late hem boyle skeme wyl clene quystes stoppe hem wyth wyth hole pepyr marwe jian caste hem potte ceuere wyl potte hem stere ryjth wyl gederys powder gyngere lytel verious salt caste er jeanne serue hem fayre dysshe quyste dysshe jie manor potage whan owe shalt serue hem lytil broth put dysshe wyth quystys serue xv bowres pypis hertys nerys myltys rybbys swyne ellys mawlard gees chop hem smal thanne parboyle hem fayre water jian vp pyke clene fayre potte caste er ale sawge salt boyle ryjth wel anne serue forthe goode potage xvj fylettys en galentyne fayre porke fore quarter skyne put jje porke fayre spete rost half jjan smyte fayre pecys caste fayre potte oynonys schrede hem pele hem pyle hem nowt smale rye panne fayre grece caste hem potte porke gode broth moton beef caste er caste er pouder pepyr canel clowys macys hem boyle wyl gederys jian tak fayre brede vynegre stepe brede brothe strayne blode ale ellys sawnderys salt lat hym boyle serue ms ms ow leaf leaf bk cookery book harleian ms potage dyvers xvij garbage fayre garbagys chykonys lied fete lyiierys gysowrys washe hem clene caste hem fayre potte caste er freysshe brothe beef ellys moton boyle lye wyth brecle ley pepir safroun maces clowys lytil verious salt serue maner sewe xviij pertrich stewyde fayre mary brothe beef motou whan wyl sothyn brothe owt potte strayne thorw straynowr put erj en potte gocle quantyte tvyne half put er pertryche stuffe hym wyth hole pepir merw sewe ventys pertriche clowys maces hole pepir caste potte boyle gederys whan pertryche boylid potte fyre whan thou schalt scrue hym caste potte powder gyngere salt safron serue xix smale bp dys stwyde smale byrdys pulle hem drawe hem clene washe hem fayre schoppe leggys frye hem panne freysshe grece ryjt wyl ley hem fayre lynen clothe lette grece renne owt oynonys mynce hem smale frye hem fayre freysshe grece caste hem erj en potte gode porcyon canel wyne draw orw straynoure caste potte oynonys caste bryddys er clowys maces lytil quantyte powder pepir iev lete hem boyle gederys caste er whyte sugre powder gyngere salt safron serue xx papyns fayre mylke plowre drawe orw strayn oure set ouer fyre boyle whyle owt kele jolkys eyroun draw orwe straynour caste er sugre gode quantyte caste er lytil salt sette fyre tyl sum ikke nowt boyle fullyche stere wyl putte dysshe alle brode serue rennyng xxj blandissorye almaundys blawnche hem grynde hem morter tempore hem freysshe broj capoun beef swete wyne jif lente fyssday brothe freysshe fysshe swete wyne boyle hem gederys goode whyle enne caste fayre lynen clo clene drye draw marrow douce ms fy brothe marrow cookery book harleian ms potage dyvers oj wyth ladel alle water fynde ryth makyst cold creme jeanne owt potte caste fayre potte boyle jeanne brawn capoun tese smal bray mortar ellys fyssday pyke elys codlyng haddok temper ta almau mylke caste sugre er ian caste hem potte lete hem boyle gederys goode whyle enne owt potte alle bote dresse dysshe meni don cold creme sette er eed anys comfyte ellys allemaundys blaunchid jeanne serue goode potage xxij venyson broth kybbys venysouu wasshe hem clene fayre water strayne water orw straynoure potte caste er yenysoun percely sawge powder pepyr clowys maces yynegre lytyl red wyne caste ere anne latte boyle tyl serue xxiij nomblys venyson nombles venysoun cutte hem smal whyle ey ben raw fieysshe bro watere wyne eche quantyte powder pepir canel hem boyle gederys tyl enne caste powder gyngere lytil venegre salt sesyn vp jeanne serue maner gode potage xxiiij drawyn grwel fayre water lene bef hem boyle whan beef hath boylid vp pyke lete blede vessel jienne caste blode fleysshe potte jeanne caste er otemele percely sawge make er gode grwele en draw orw straynowre putte fayre potte boyle anne caste er salt jif nowt brown litil blode caste er draw make brouw serue xxv balloke brothe elys fle hem kytte hem gobo ms caste hem fayre potte fayre water percely oynonys schrede hem gederys nowt smal clowes maces powder pepyr caste er gode porcyon wyne jjen jest kew ale caste er boyle elys byn wyl boylid fayre stokfysshe pe skyn caste er boyle whyle en safroun salt lytil yenegre caste er serue xxvj coleys gode capoun boyle hem tendere pyke ms men bk ms blede repeated cookery book harleian ms potage dyvers clene bonys jie skyn bray hym morter tempere hym tvyth brothe strayne hym orw straynoure enne brawn fleyssbe lytil whyte brede bray hem alle gederys morter en lycowr bonys skyn brothe pe capoim sothyn ynne al tempere nowt icke jien put potte al bote boyle ing caste jier litil powder gyngere sugre salt jif fyssheday haddok pyke tenche eejge codlynd pyke bonys tempere wyth almaunde mylke make hot caste er sugre salt seme xxvij soupes dorye gode almaunde mylke draw wyth wyn hem boyle gederys caste er safroun salt paynemayn kytte toste wete wyne ley dysshe caste syrip er make dragge powder gyngere sugre canel clowes maces caste jier di essid serue jeanne potage gode xxviij soupes jamberlayne wyne canel powder gyngere sugre eche porcyou pan straynoure hange pynne caste ale er renne twyis ryis throgh tyl renne clei en paynemaynhe kyt maner brewes toste wete lycowre ley dysshe caste blawnche powder er pan caste pe lycowr vp pe soppys serue hem maner potage xxix lyode soppes mylke boyle anne plkys eyroun tryid fro whyte draw hem orwe straynoure caste hem mylke sette pe fyre hete nowt boyle store wyl tyl somwhat ikke enne caste er salt sugre kytte fayre paynemaynnys round soppys caste soppys er serue potage xxx soupes dorroy shere oynonys frye hem oyle jeanne wyne boyle oynonys toste whyte brede dysshe caste er gode almaunde mylke temper wyth wyne aune dorry bowte messe xxxj brawn en peuerade wyne powder canel draw orw straynour sette pe fyre lette boyle caste er clowes maces powder pepyr smale oynonys al hole leaf chamberlain leaf lo bk cookery book harleian ms potage dyters par boyle hem hot watere caste er hem boyle gederys brawn lesshe nowt inne jif sowsyd lete stepe whyle hot water tyl tendere fan caste sirip jjen sawnderys yynegre caste er lete boyle alle gederys tyl fen gyngere caste er serue late nowt ikke ne inne potage shulde xxxij auter brawn en peuerade myghty brothe beef capouu enne clene freysshe brawn sethe jif freysshe brawn roste leche pecys caste fe brothe jeanne hoole oynonys pylle hem anne yynegre er canelle sette fe fyre draw yt fotw straynoure caste er en clowys maces powder pepyr caste er lytil saunderys sette fyre boyle tylle oynonys brawn ben euyne sothyn nowt moche jian lykoure mad bred yinegre wyne sesyn vp caste er saffroun make coloure bryth salt serue xxxiij oyle soppys gode quantyte oynonys mynse hem smale sethe fayre water hem vp gode quantite stale ale iij galouns er pynte oyle fryid caste oynonys er boyle alle gederys gode whyle caste er safroune powder pepyr sugre salt serue alle bote tostips maner mawlard capon hoc qiicsre xxxiv char dewar don pere wardonys sethe hem yne fayre water grynd morter drawe hem orwe strayn oure wyth owte ony lycoure put hem potte ta sugre clarifiyd hony canel lete hem boyle fro fyre kele caste er jolkys raw eyroun tylle jjikke caste er pouder gyngere serue manere fysshe jif lente lef jolkys eyroun lat remenaunt boyle longe tylle ikke ow temp ryd wyth jolkys maner charde quyncc serue hem maner eys xxxv perys en composte tvyne canel gret dele whyte sugre set fyre hete bote nowt boyle draw orwe straynoure fayre datys pyke owt stonys leche hem alle inne caste er anne wardouys pare hem sethe hem generally ji douce ms end recipe reaisjisehe cookery book harleian ms potage dyvers leche hem alle inne caste er syryppe jeanne lytii sawndei ys caste sette fyre jif hast charde quynce caste er boyling loke stonde wyl sugre vryl lyid wyth canel caste salt er boyle caste yt treen vessel lat kele serue orth xxxvj vele kede henne bokenade tele kyde henne boyle hem fayre water ellys freysshe brothe smyte hem pecys pyke hem clene draw brothe orwe straynoure caste er percely sawge tsope maces clowys boyle tyl flesshe sette fyre lye vp vritk raw jolkys eyroun caste er ponder gyngere galyngale canel maces quybybis oynonys mynsyd eoysonys coraunce coloure yt wyth safroun put er yin yele serue orth xxxviij storion brothe fayre freysshe storgeoun choppe fayre water janne fro fyre strayne brothe orw straynoure potte pyke clene fysshe caste er powder pepir clowes maces canel jeanne fayre brede stepe lycowre caste er boyle gederys caste en safroun er gyngere salt yynegre anne serue ynne oystres en grauey gode mylke altaaundys drawe wyth wyne gode fysshe broj sette fyre boyle caste jjer clowes maces sugre powder gyngere fewe parboylid oynonys mynsyd fan fayre oystrys parboyle hem fayre water caste hem er lete hem boyle gederys jianne serue hem foz xl oystrys gr uy bastard grete oystiys schale hem water oystrys ale brede straynid water put potte gyngere sugre saffron powder pepir salt boyle wyl en put yn oystrys er dresse xlj gelyne dubbatte henne rost hure almoste choppe hyre fayre pecys caste potte caste er freysshe broj half wyne clowes maces pepir frye hem fayre freysshe grece frye myncyd oynenons caste alle jie potte caste jier fayre freysshe brothe half wyne maces clowes powder pepir canelle fayre brede wyth brothe stepe draw ovw straynoure wyth vynegre whan wyl boylid caste pe lycoure er powder gyngere salt sesyn vp seme orth xliij mortrewes fysshe gornard congere fore navel wyth grece hynde navel hery bonys codlyng lyuer spaune sethe fayre water pyke owt bonys grynde fysshe morter tem vp wyth almaunde mylke caste er gratyd brede jjan yt vp put fayre potte boyle caste er sugre salt serue mortrewys loke jjow caste gyngere boue xliiij mortrewys de fleyssh porke sej wyl jeanne vppe puue swerde pyke owt bonys hakke grynd smal enne sylf brothe tem ale en fayre gratyd brede er se coloure saffroun lye jolkys eyroun make euen salt caste ponder gyngere bouyn dysshe xlv make blawnche perrye whyte lekys sefe hem potte presse hem vp hacke smal bord nym gode almaunde mylke lytil eys alle jjes gederys sej stere wyl sugre hony dresse yn jeanne powderd elys se hem fayre water broyle hem kytte hom long pecys ley ij iij dysshe putte perrey er dysshe serue dysshys gederys venysou furmenty xlvj poumes fayre buttys ele hem grynd hem morter wyth jolkys eyroun whyte eyroun caste ey powder pepyr canel gyngere clowys powj datys mynced safroun raysonys coraunce sethe panne wyth fayre water boyle fan wete handys eaw eyroun leaf hairy inj gkin xhine bk cookery book harleian ms potage dyvers rolle ia hondys smaller gretter wolt haue caste boyling water boyle putte spate round lete hem rosty en flowre jolkys eyroun whyte draw hem oi straynowre caste er ponder gyngere mako bature grene ith lus percely malwys tyme jere whete caste jie pommys ej turne boute serue orth xlvij cawdelle ferry plkys eyi oun raw tryid fro whyte jmn gode wyne warme potte fayre fyre caste er plkys stere wyl nowt boyle tylle ikke caste jjer sugre safroun salt maces gelofres galyngale grounde smal flowre canelle whan ovf dressyst yn caste blanke ponder er xlviij tayloures gode mylke almaundys draw wyne water caste hym potte caste gret roysouns corauns mencyd datys clowes maces pouder pepir canel safroun gode dele salt boyle whyle ly wyth flowre rys ellys ta brede gratyd caste er sugre serue lyke mortrewys caste pouder gyngere boue xlix bryndons wyn putte potte clarifiyd hony saunderys pepir safroun clowes maces quybibys mynced datys pynys roysonys corauns lytil vynegre sethe fyre sethe fygys wyne grynde hem draw hem orw straynoure caste fer lete hem boyle alle gederys fayre flowre safroun sugre fayre water ande make er cakys hem inne inow kytte hem lyke lechyngys caste hem fayre oyle fry hem lytil whyle jeanne hem owt panne caste vesselle syrippe serue hem bryndonys fe sirippe dysshe sirippe rennyng styf potage fysshday make styf poshote milke ale jjan draw croddys orw straynoure wyth whyte swete wyne ellys rochelle wyne make sum rennyng sum stondyng put sugre gode quantyte er hony nowt moche hete lytil serue al brode ipe dysshys straw canel gyngere jif ou haue blank powder straw kepe whyte yt jjan serue orth thine lye allay leaf long thin strips ms wyth cookery book harleian ms potage dyvers ij cawdelle de almaunde haddok elys hake hed freysshe mylweli hedys pouches lyuerys sethe hem fayre water hem vp fayre bord mynce smal pouches gode freysshe brothe samoun turbut elys cast mynced pouches er ponder pepyr boyle brothe pouches lyuerys wer sodoun iu stipe fayre brede draw oyw straynoure mynce lyuer fayre pecys whan pouches haue boylid licoure caste leuer er boyle whyle caste er lyuerys wyne venegre safroun salt late boyle whyle serue iat rennyng liij rapeye half eygys halfe eoysonys boyle hem wyne ian bray hem morter draw wyth lycoure jiorw straynoure jikke stondynge jeanne roysons corauns pynys clowys gode mylke almaunde tender porke hew smal bray morter eyroun di aw orw cloj temper vppe flesshe jjer caste potte mylke sette ouer fyre sesyn wyth salt safroun caste er boyle yt komyth lye yvith wyne cushions cookery book harleian ms leche vyaundez pygge eii farce hym sewe hole lat hym roste si rue xxxiiij poddyng capou necke percely gysour leuer herte perboyle fayre water au choppe hem smal put raw plkys eyroun ij iij ier choppe iov maces clowes put er safroun lytil pouder pepir salt fille hym vppc sew hym lay long capon eakke prycke hym cr roste hym serue orth xxxv capoun gos farced percely swynys grece sewet schepe parboyle hem gederys til ey ben tendyr harde plkys eyroun choppe ta caste er pouder pepir gyngere canel safroun salt grapis tyme jere clowys nowe defawte grapis oynons fyrst beff draw mylke almaundys piggys er en mence sawge ian grynd hym smal draw owt lus oyw straynoure clowys er pouder gyngere canelle galyngale vynegre sugre salt ian jeanne serue xxxviij kyde forsyde whan ey ben clene lytil watere late hem sej til ej ben drye ej schorge fan hew horde er en sugre safrouw goode quantyte gode pouder caste jj boyle fere frye oyle make er froyse serue orth xliij payn grace lytel oj er panne bater er lat renne al bowte jje panne jiat pan al helyd sette panne jen ouer fyre colys oj er panne boue jiat er panne tyl baken whan bake wol ryse fro eggys panne kydes fleyssche png porke hew percely ysope sauerey hew hit smal jirow mong fleyssche panne cofynne colys hele er panne colys bouyn lat baken wyl whan eyroun broke hem pykes draw orw straynoure caste jolkys wolt anne serue xxxj herbelade buttes porke smyte hem pecys sette ouer fyre sej hem fa rre waters whan soj ley fayre bord pyke owt alle bonys hew smal put fayre bolle ysope sawge percely gode quantite bray hem temper hem vppe fat broj wyl mylke broun en pouder canelle gyngere sugre caste er make fayre cofyns lat hem hard ovyn roysonys coraunce ley cofynne taylid datys kyt long eii eyroun fewe hit grynde morter hard yolkes egges drawe hit vppe goods vinegre make hit thyii seson hit powder peper ginger salt cowche thi pigge disshes caste fe sirippe er vppon serue forthe stwed beejff faire eibbes ffresh beef thou wilt roste hit hil hit nygfi ynowe put hit faire possenet caste er rcely oynons mynced reysons corauns powder peper canel clowes saundres safferon salt caste wyii lituh vynegre sette yd potte lete hit boile sokingly faire charcole til hit ynogh eil lay essii disshes sirippe vppoil serve stwed mutton faire mutton hath beii roste elles capons suche er flessfi mynce faire put hit possenet elles bitwen ij siluer disshes caste thereto faire rcely oynons smah mynced caste wyn lituh vynegre vergeous pouder peper canel salt saffron lete stue faire coles eh serue hit forthe wyne ne vynegre ale mustard quantite vergeous pe stede vyne vinegre capons stwed rcelly sauge isoppe eose mary tyme breke hit bitwen thi hondes stoppe capon colowr hym fol cookery book ii harl venison fritters safferon couche erthen potte brasse ley splentes vnderneth al aboujt sides capon toiiche things potte strawe good herbes potte put pottel avyn thou gete licowr hele potte close led stoppe hit aboujte dogh hater eier oute set hit faire charcole lete seeth easly longe tih hit ynowe hit erthen potte jjen set hit fire whan takest hit downe lete hit touche grounde breking whan hete ouer past oute capon prik theii make sirippe wyne reysons corance sugur safferon boile hit lituh medel pouder ginger litul wyii er awey fatte sewe capon sirypp sewe powre hit capon serue flathonys mylke yolkes egges ale drawe hem thorgh straynowr white sugur blak melt faire butter put thereto salt make fairs coffyns put hem nowne til jiei lituh hard eq pile dissh fastned fill coffyns therewith seid stuffe late hem bake en hem oute serue hem forthe caste sugur ynogh oil hem venyson ybake hanches venysoil parboile faire water salt en faire paast ley ofi venyson cutte pieces wolt cast vnder hit aboue hit powder ginger peper salt medylde togidre sette hem oven lete hem bake til jcj ynogh frutomls yolkes egges drawe hem thorgh streynoi caste faire floure berme ale stere togidre til hit thik pared hit lituh nojt boyle douce ms clere douce ms adds pull loynes chekyne iche oth awey skyn puue hem iu rtres aud ley qnniur chikync rihbe pygge gedrys dissh douce ms fol cookery book ii haul chare de wardone mawmene dratve hit tliorgli streyiio faire dates oute stones leche hem faire gobettes al thyfi cast theii pere wardones pare hem seth hem leche hem iaire gobettes pike oute core cast hem syrypp lituh saundres caste boylyng loke hit stonde gynger sugur aley hit ta canell cast salt thereto lete boyle theii caste oute treyii vesseh lete kele theii pare clene rasinges ginger temper ij iij dales wyne ley hem clarefied hony colde ah day night en rasons oute hony caste hem peres composte theii seme hit sirippe ah colde nought bote chare de wardone peer wardens seth hem wine water theii hem vppi grinde hem morter drawe hem thorgh streynoure licowr put hem potte sug ellej clarefiede hony caneh ynowe lete hem boile theii hit irom fire lete kele caste rawe yolkes eyreii til hit thik caste thereto powder ginger ynowe serue hit maner ryse hit lentoii tyme leve yolkes eyreii lete remnawnt boyle longe til thikk hit tempered yolkes eyreii maner maii sethej charge de quyns thefa serue hit maner rys mawmene vernage oj er strenger wyne maii finde put hit potte cast gode quantite powder canell sette hit oner fire yif hit hete theii wring oute softe thorgh streyno jjc draff oute put faire potte pike newe faire pynes wassh hem clene wyne caste hem grete rtntite ere white sugur ynowe moche thi licoz cast confeccions charge de quyns goode quantite cast thereto drawe saundres stronge wyne thorgh streynomr cast put al potte cast good quantite clowes sette hit ouer fire gif hit boyling almondes drawe hem mighti wyne thorgh streynomr boiling ley hit vp yeve hit boyle ley hit vp ale gif hit boyle sette hit fro fire caste douce ms douce ms fol lob ms repeats vesselk treyne treeu wooden shavings parings douce ms iv eny lieour ms chare ami dons fol omits lei cookery book ii harl ladeli thou dressest hit saucer vincgr mighty wyne wete saucer ladeli fore cleving loke hit haue sugur ynogh serve hit longe wortes de peson grene pesyfi wassh hem clene cast hem potte boyle hem til breke hem vppe fro fire putte hem broth vesseh lete hem kele drawe hem thorgh streynowr faire potte theii oynones ij iij peces hole wortes boyle hem fayre water hem vppe ley hem oil faire horde kutte hem iij iiij peces caste hem oynons potte di aweii peseii late hem boile togidre til ah tendur theii faire oile fray ellej ressh broth manor fissh jiou maist oyle quantite caste thereto saffroii salt quantite lete hem boyle wel togidre til befi ynogh stere hem weh euermore serue hem forthe elys sorre eles fie hem choppe hem faire colpons wassh hem clene putte hem faire potte theii rcelly oynons shrede togidre eles pouder peper broth fissh set hit ouer fire lete hem boyle togidre en lofe brede alay brede broth drawe hit thorgh streynoi whaii eles beil almoost sodde ynowe caste lete hem boile togidre hem yp fro fire cast yer salte vinegre serue hit ballok broth elys fie hem kutte hem colpons caste hem potte faire water rcelly oynons shrede hem smale clowes maces pouder peper pouder caneh gode porciori wyne cast thereto lete hem boyle whaii jjc eles beth wel boiled faire stokfissh douce ms stondyng douce ms vernage douce ms vernage added douce ms douce ms reads elles fressb broth maner ther wyne fol cookery book ii harl sops muscles mortrewes wey skyn caste thereto lete boyle whan eles ben weli boyled faire bernie put perto lete boyle awhile eil saffron salt litel viuegre cast nojt stiff seme fore good potage faire disshes ah bote froyte de almondes blak sugur coldc water caste sugur water potte lete liera boile togidre salt skeme hem clene hit kele cu almoudes blanche hem almondes blanche hem wassh hem faire water bray hem small morter faire water hem water togidre som thik drawe hem orgh streynomr faire potte set hem ouer fire lete hem boyle en hem downe cast thereto salte lete stonde forlonge wey ij cast lituu yincgre erto en cast hit faire lynneil cloth faire wassh jje water wronge oute fol called bnias douce ms froydelet dalmaiides fol cookery book harl boild creme letlardes cast hit ali abrode laduh lete men hold cloth al abrode tu ladiu draw vndur cloth draw awey water ah man en gadur al creme togidur clothe en cloth creme hange hit vppon ppl lete water droppe oute thre houres theii hit cloth putte hit hoh tre caste sug ynogh ereto litul salt hit wex thik swete wyne temper hit ale en reysons corannce clene wassh put hem ipej seyii whan hit dressed streyuowr caste mylke pen drawe iuce herbes jiou wih ey beii goode drawe hem thorgh stre tio whan mylke bigynneth crudde caste luce thereto ou wilt haue grene iou wilt haue rede saundres cast mylke whaii croddeth leue herbes ou wilt haue hit yelowe saffron caste mylke whaii hit cruddeth leve saundres jiou wilt haue al es colowrs potte mylke luse herbes anoper potte mylke saffron anoper potte mylke saundres put hem al lynnen cloj presse hem al togidur pon wilt haue colowr cloth streyne cloth maner bete oil clothe ladeh skymo make sad flatte leche faire knyfe fry leches paii lituh fressh
